GE07mbh_04_u:001.000-0001_002: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet

GE07mbh_04_u:001.000-0003_001: bhārataṃ bhānumā(me)nindur yadi na syur amī tra[yaḥ]
GE07mbh_04_u:001.000-0004_004: namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-0005_002: draupadī ca kathaṃ brahmann ajñātā duḥkhitāvasat

GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0004: ye tadbhaktā vasanti sma vanavāse tapasvinaḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0012: tad vatsyāmo vayaṃ channās tad anujñātum arhatha

GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0015: yuktācārāś ca yuktāś ca kṣaye svasya janasya ca

GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0017: api nas tad bhaved bhūyo yad vayaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0019: ity uktvā duḥkhaśokārtaḥ śucir dharmasutas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0021: tam athāśvāsayan sarve brāhmaṇā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0022: atha dhaumyo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mahārthaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0023: rājan vidvān bhavān dāntaḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0024: naivaṃvidhāḥ pramuhyanti narāḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0025: devair apy āpadaḥ prāptāś channaiś ca bahubhis tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0030: brāhmaṇaṃ toṣayiṣyaṃś ca brahmarūpaṃ nidhāya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0031: prasādād brahmaṇo rājan diteḥ putrān mahābalān
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0032: nirjitya tarasā śatrūn punar lokāñ jugopa ha
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0036: baler yathā hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ vikramais tac ca te śrutam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0037: aurveṇa vasatā channam ūrau brahmarṣiṇā tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0038: yat kṛtaṃ tāta lokeṣu tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0040: vajraṃ praviśya śakrasya yat kṛtaṃ tac ca te śrutam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0041: hutāśanena yac cāpaḥ praviśya channam āsatā

GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0044: nirdagdhāḥ śatravaḥ sarve vasatā gavi varṣaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0045: viṣṇunā vasatā cāpi gṛhe daśarathasya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0047: evam ete mahātmānaḥ pracchannās tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0048: ajayañ chātravān mukhyāṃs tathā tvam api jeṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0054: dharmānugatayā buddhyā na kiṃ cit sāhasaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0055: sahadevo mayā nityaṃ nakulaś ca nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0057: na vayaṃ vartma hāsyāmo yasmin yokṣyati no bhavān

GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0061: sarve vedavido mukhyā yatayo munayas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0063: te tu bhṛtyāś ca dūtāś ca śilpinaḥ paricārakāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.001d-001_0065: saha dhaumyena vidvāṃsas tathā te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:001.002-0008_002: akurvata punar mantraṃ saha dhaumyena pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.002-0008_004: bhrātṝn kṛṣṇāṃ ca saṃprekṣya dhaumyaṃ ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_04_u:001.002a: tathā tu sa varāṃl labdhvā dharmād dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.002c: gatvāśramaṃ brāhmaṇebhya ācakhyau sarvam eva tat

GE07mbh_04_u:001.005b-0009_001: chadmanā hṛtarājyāś ca niḥsvāś ca bahuśaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.005b-0009_002: uṣitāś ca vane kṛcchraṃ yathā dvādaśa vatsarān
GE07mbh_04_u:001.006a: sa sādhu kaunteya ito vāsam arjuna rocaya
GE07mbh_04_u:001.008a: kiṃ tu vāsāya rāṣṭrāṇi kīrtayiṣyāmi kāni cit
GE07mbh_04_u:001.008c: ramaṇīyāni guptāni teṣāṃ kiṃ cit sma rocaya
GE07mbh_04_u:001.009a: santi ramyā janapadā bahvannāḥ paritaḥ kurūn
GE07mbh_04_u:001.009e: daśārṇā navarāṣṭraṃ ca mallāḥ śālvā yugaṃdharāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.009f-0014_002: ramaṇīyaṃ janākīrṇaṃ subhikṣaṃ sphītam eva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:001.010a: eteṣāṃ katamo rājan nivāsas tava rocate

GE07mbh_04_u:001.010d-0015_001: yatra te rocate rājaṃs tatra gacchāmahe vayam

GE07mbh_04_u:001.011a: evam etan mahābāho yathā sa bhagavān prabhuḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:001.012a: avaśyaṃ tv eva vāsārthaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ śivaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_04_u:001.012d-0018_001: yasya yasya vaco hīdaṃ samaharṣata pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_04_u:001.013a: matsyo virāṭo balavān abhirakṣet sa pāṇḍavān

GE07mbh_04_u:001.015a: yāni yāni ca karmāṇi tasya śakṣyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.015c: kartuṃ yo yat sa tat karma bravītu kurunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.016a: naradeva kathaṃ karma rāṣṭre tasya kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:001.016d-0020_002: na tavābhyucitaṃ karma nṛśaṃsaṃ nāpi kaitavam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.017a: mṛdur vadānyo hrīmāṃś ca dhārmikaḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.017c: rājaṃs tvam āpadā kliṣṭaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_04_u:001.018a: na duḥkham ucitaṃ kiṃ cid rājan veda yathā janaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.018c: sa imām āpadaṃ prāpya kathaṃ ghorāṃ tariṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:001.019a: śṛṇudhvaṃ yat kariṣyāmi karma vai kurunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.020c: kaṅko nāma dvijo bhūtvā matākṣaḥ priyadevitā
GE07mbh_04_u:001.021a: vaiḍūryān kāñcanān dāntān phalair jyotīrasaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:001.021d-0022_002: lohitāṃś cāśmagarbhāṃś ca santi tāta dhanāni me
GE07mbh_04_u:001.021d-0022_004: apy etān pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā saṃprahṛṣyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.021d-0022_005: tān vikīrya same deśe ramaṇīye vipāṃsule
GE07mbh_04_u:001.021d-0023_001: kaṅko nāmnā parivrāṭ ca virāṭasya sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.021d-0023_003: brāhmo vedo mayādhīto vedāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.021d-0025_002: na ca māṃ vetsyate kaś cit toṣayiṣye ca taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.022c: iti vakṣyāmi rājānaṃ yadi mām anuyokṣyate
GE07mbh_04_u:001.023a: ity etad vo mayākhyātaṃ vihariṣyāmy ahaṃ yathā vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.023b-0026_001: evaṃ nirdiśya cātmānaṃ niḥśvasann uṣṇam ārtijam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.023b-0026_002: vimuñcann aśru netrābhyāṃ bhīmasenam uvāca ha yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.023b-0027_001: bhīmasena kathaṃ karma tasya rāṣṭre kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:001.023b-0027_009: tvayā hatvā mahābāho vanaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:001.023b-0028_001: madhye nivāsaṃ bhīmasya duṣkaraṃ tasya bhūpateḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:001.023c: vṛkodara virāṭe tvaṃ raṃsyase kena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.001c: upasthāsyāmi rājānaṃ virāṭam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.001d-0030_001: rasān nānāvidhāṃś cāpi svāduvan madhurāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.002e: tān apy abhibhaviṣyāmi prītiṃ saṃjanayann aham
GE07mbh_04_u:002.002f-0031_002: svādu vyañjanam āsvādya manye prīto bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:002.002f-0032_001: kṛtakṛtyā hi ye tasya bhaviṣyanti suśikṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.003c: tat prekṣya vipulaṃ karma rājā prīto bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:002.003d-0033_002: rājñas tasya paripreṣyā maṃsyante māṃ yathā nṛpam
GE07mbh_04_u:002.003d-0034_001: dvipān siṃhān haniṣyāmi krīḍārthaṃ tasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_04_u:002.003d-0034_002: yodhān anyān haniṣyāmi prītiṃ tasya vivardhayan
GE07mbh_04_u:002.004a: dvipā vā balino rājan vṛṣabhā vā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.004c: vinigrāhyā yadi mayā nigrahīṣyāmi tān api
GE07mbh_04_u:002.004d-0035_001: vṛṣo vā mahiṣo vāpi nāgo vā ṣāṣṭihāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.004d-0035_002: siṃho vyāghro yadā cāsya grahītavyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:002.005a: ye ca ke cin niyotsyanti samājeṣu niyodhakāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.005b-0036_001: ye ca tasya mahāmallāḥ samareṣv aparājitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.005c: tān ahaṃ nihaniṣyāmi prītiṃ tasya vivardhayan
GE07mbh_04_u:002.006a: na tv etān yudhyamānān vai haniṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:002.006c: tathaitān pātayiṣyāmi yathā yāsyanti na kṣayam
GE07mbh_04_u:002.006d-0038_001: ārālikā vā sūdā vā ye 'sya yuktā mahānase
GE07mbh_04_u:002.006d-0038_002: tān ahaṃ prīṇayiṣyāmi manuṣyān svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.008a: ātmānam ātmanā rakṣaṃś cariṣyāmi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:002.008c: ity etat pratijānāmi vihariṣyāmy ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.009a: yam agnir brāhmaṇo bhūtvā samāgacchan nṛṇāṃ varam
GE07mbh_04_u:002.010c: so 'yaṃ kiṃ karma kaunteyaḥ kariṣyati dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.011a: yo 'yam āsādya taṃ dāvaṃ tarpayām āsa pāvakam
GE07mbh_04_u:002.011d-0040_001: vāsukeḥ sarparājasya svasāraṃ hṛtavāṃś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.011e: śreṣṭhaḥ pratiyudhāṃ nāma so 'rjunaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:002.011f-0041_001: parvatānāṃ ca himavān kurukṣetraṃ ca tīrthataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.011f-0041_002: grahāṇām api śītāṃśur garuḍaḥ pakṣiṇām api
GE07mbh_04_u:002.012a: sūryaḥ pratapatāṃ śreṣṭho dvipadāṃ brāhmaṇo varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.012c: āśīviṣaś ca sarpāṇām agnis tejasvināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.013a: āyudhānāṃ varo varjaḥ kakudmī ca gavāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.013c: hradānām udadhiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ parjanyo varṣatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.014a: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca nāgānāṃ hastiṣv airāvato varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.014c: putraḥ priyāṇām adhiko bhāryā ca suhṛdāṃ varā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.014d-0042_001: mātā gurūṇāṃ pravarā varṣatāṃ jalado varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.016a: so 'yam indrād anavaro vāsudevāc ca bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:002.018a: yaṃ manye dvādaśaṃ rudram ādityānāṃ trayodaśam
GE07mbh_04_u:002.018b-0045_001: vasūnāṃ navamaṃ manye grahāṇāṃ daśamaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.018e: dakṣiṇe caiva savye ca gavām iva vahaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.019a: himavān iva śailānāṃ samudraḥ saritām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:002.019c: tridaśānāṃ yathā śakro vasūnām iva havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.019d-0046_001: grahāṇām iva vai sūryo nakṣatrāṇāṃ niśākaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.019d-0046_002: meruḥ sarvagirīṇāṃ ca sarpāṇām iva vāsukiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020a: mṛgāṇām iva śārdūlo garuḍaḥ patatām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020c: varaḥ saṃnahyamānānām arjunaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_003: saṃśuśruve ca dharmātmā yas tam arthaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_005: yas tu devān manuṣyāṃś ca sarvāś caikaratho 'jayat
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_006: (16cd) sa bhīmadhanvā śvetāśvaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_009: (19ab) samudra iva sindhūnāṃ śailānāṃ himavān iva
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_010: (19c) mahendra iva devānāṃ dānavānāṃ balir yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_011: supratīko gajānāṃ ca yugyānāṃ turago yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_012: (20a) kubera iva yakṣāṇāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ kesarī yathā

GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_021: (14cd) putraḥ priyāṇām adhiko bhāryā ca suhṛdāṃ varā

GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_030: kṣipraṃ cāṇuṃ ca citraṃ ca dhruvaṃ ca vadatāṃ varaḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_035: (18ef) dakṣiṇaṃ caiva savyaṃ ca vāhāv anaḍuho yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_037: śyāmo yuvā guḍākeśo darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0047_040: (20cd) bībhatsur bhīmadhanvā ca kiṃ kariṣyati cārjunaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.020d-0052_001: arjuna tvaṃ kathaṃ karma tasya rāṣṭre cariṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:002.021c: jyāghātau hi mahāntau me saṃvartuṃ nṛpa duṣkarau
GE07mbh_04_u:002.021d-0053_001: śapto 'ham āsaṃ pūrvaṃ vai urvaśyā kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_04_u:002.021d-0054_001: tac chāpaṃ prerayan rājan vihariṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:002.021d-0056_001: kiṃ tu kāryavaśād etad ācariṣyāmi kutsitam
GE07mbh_04_u:002.021d-0060_001: so 'haṃ klaibyena veṣeṇa ṣaṇḍhako 'ham iti bruvan
GE07mbh_04_u:002.023a: paṭhann ākhyāyikāṃ nāma strībhāvena punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:002.024a: gītaṃ nṛttaṃ vicitraṃ ca vāditraṃ vividhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:002.026c: uṣitāsmīti vakṣyāmi pṛṣṭo rājñā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:002.026d-0062_001: urvaśyā api śāpena prāpto 'smi nṛpa ṣaṇḍatām
GE07mbh_04_u:002.027a: etena vidhinā channaḥ kṛtakena yathā nalaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.001a: kiṃ tvaṃ nakula kurvāṇas tatra tāta cariṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:003.001b-0064_001: karma tattvaṃ samācakṣva rāṣṭre tasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.001b-0066_001: īdṛśīm āpadaṃ prāpya kathaṃ tatra nivatsyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:003.001b-0067_001: aduḥkhārhaś ca bālaś ca lālitaś cāpi nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.001b-0068_001: so 'yam ārtaś ca śāntaś ca kiṃ nu rocayitā tv iha
GE07mbh_04_u:003.001b-0069_001: sa tvaṃ mṛduś ca śūraś ca kiṃ nu te rocate tv iha
GE07mbh_04_u:003.001c: sukumāraś ca śūraś ca darśanīyaḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.002c: granthiko nāma nāmnāhaṃ karmaitat supriyaṃ mama
GE07mbh_04_u:003.002d-0071_002: na mā paribhaviṣyanti janā jātu hi karhi cit
GE07mbh_04_u:003.003c: priyāś ca satataṃ me 'śvāḥ kururāja yathā tava
GE07mbh_04_u:003.003d-0072_001: naduṣṭāś ca bhaviṣyanti kiśorā vaḍavā api
GE07mbh_04_u:003.003d-0072_002: naduṣṭāś ca bhaviṣyanti pṛṣṭheṣu ca ratheṣu ca
GE07mbh_04_u:003.003d-0074_001: na māṃ paribhaviṣyanti kiśorā vaḍavās tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.003d-0074_002: naduṣṭāś ca bhaviṣyanti pṛṣṭhe dhuri ca madgatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.004c: tebhya evaṃ pravakṣyāmi vihariṣyāmy ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.004d-0076_001: pāṇḍavena purā tāta aśveṣv adhikṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.004d-0077_001: yudhiṣṭhirasyāśvabandho veda māṃ teṣu teṣv aham
GE07mbh_04_u:003.004d-0078_001: virāṭanagare channaś cariṣyāmi mahīpate yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:003.005-0084_004: na cāsya calitaṃ kiṃ cid dadṛśus tadvido janāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.005-0084_006: adhikaṃ mātur asmākaṃ kuntyāḥ priyataraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.005c: kiṃ vā tvaṃ tāta kurvāṇaḥ pracchanno vicariṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:003.006c: pratiṣeddhā ca dogdhā ca saṃkhyāne kuśalo gavām
GE07mbh_04_u:003.007a: tantipāla iti khyāto nāmnā viditam astu te
GE07mbh_04_u:003.007b-0087_001: abhimānāt tu māṃ rājan pravadiṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.007c: nipuṇaṃ ca cariṣyāmi vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.007d-0079_001: na ca māṃ vetsyate kaś cit toṣayiṣye ca taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_04_u:003.007d-0080_001: vairāṭe bhūpa saṃchanno vihariṣyāmy ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.007d-0082_001: ity etan matpratijñātaṃ vihariṣyāmy ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.008a: ahaṃ hi bhavatā goṣu satataṃ prakṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.008c: tatra me kauśalaṃ karma avabuddhaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:003.009a: lakṣaṇaṃ caritaṃ cāpi gavāṃ yac cāpi maṅgalam
GE07mbh_04_u:003.009c: tat sarvaṃ me suviditam anyac cāpi mahīpate
GE07mbh_04_u:003.010c: yeṣāṃ mūtram upāghrāya api vandhyā prasūyate
GE07mbh_04_u:003.011a: so 'ham evaṃ cariṣyāmi prītir atra hi me sadā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.011b-0089_002: toṣayiṣye 'pi rājānaṃ mā bhūc cintā tavānagha
GE07mbh_04_u:003.011c: na ca māṃ vetsyati paras tat te rocatu pārthiva
GE07mbh_04_u:003.011d-0090_001: ity etad vaḥ pratijñātaṃ vicariṣyāmy ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.012a: iyaṃ tu naḥ priyā bhāryā prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
GE07mbh_04_u:003.012c: māteva paripālyā ca pūjyā jyeṣṭheva ca svasā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.013a: kena sma karmaṇā kṛṣṇā draupadī vicariṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:003.013c: na hi kiṃ cid vijānāti karma kartuṃ yathā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.014a: sukumārī ca bālā ca rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_04_u:003.014d-0092_001: ity evam uktvā bhrātṝṇāṃ pāñcālīṃ draupadīṃ prati
GE07mbh_04_u:003.014d-0093_001: athovāca tadā kṛṣṇā yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.015c: etāny evābhijānāti yato jātā hi bhāminī
GE07mbh_04_u:003.016c: naivam anyāḥ striyo yānti iti lokasya niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.016d-0094_001: ahaṃ vatsyāmi rājendra nirvṛto bhava pārthiva
GE07mbh_04_u:003.016d-0094_002: yathā te matkṛte śoko na bhaven nṛpa tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_04_u:003.016d-0094_003: yathā tu māṃ na jānanti tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_04_u:003.016d-0094_004: channā vatsyāmy ahaṃ yan māṃ na vijñāsyanti ke cana
GE07mbh_04_u:003.016d-0094_005: vṛttaṃ tac ca samākhyāsye śam āpnuhi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:003.017b-0096_002: uṣitāsmīti vakṣyāmi pṛṣṭā rājñā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:003.017b-0097_003: kṛtā caiva sadā rakṣā vratenaiva narādhipa
GE07mbh_04_u:003.017c: ātmaguptā cariṣyāmi yan māṃ tvam anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:003.018c: sā rakṣiṣyati māṃ prāptāṃ mā te bhūd duḥkham īdṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:003.018d-0098_001: ity evaṃ matpratijñātaṃ vihariṣyāmy ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.019a: kalyāṇaṃ bhāṣase kṛṣṇe kule jātā yathā vadet
GE07mbh_04_u:003.019c: na pāpam abhijānāsi sādhu sādhvīvrate sthitā
GE07mbh_04_u:003.019d-0099_001: yathā na durhṛdaḥ pāpā bhavanti sukhinaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:003.019d-0099_002: kuryās tathā tva kalyāṇi lakṣayeyur na te yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.001a: karmāṇy uktāni yuṣmābhir yāni tāni kariṣyatha
GE07mbh_04_u:004.003c: yāntu dvāravatīṃ śīghram iti me vartate matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.004a: imāś ca nāryo draupadyāḥ sarvaśaḥ paricārikāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.004d-0101_001: gatvā dvāravatīṃ caiva kāmpilyaṃ ca purottamam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.005a: sarvair api ca vaktavyaṃ na prajñāyanta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.005c: gatā hy asmān apākīrya sarve dvaitavanād iti vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:004.005d-0103_001: evaṃ te 'nyonyam āmantrya karmāṇy uktvā pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_04_u:004.005d-0103_002: dhaumyam āmantrayāmāsuḥ sa ca tān mantram abravīt vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.005d-0104_002: dhaumyaḥ purohito rājan pāṇḍavān puruṣarṣabhān dhaumya uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:004.006-0105_001: vihitaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sarvaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu suhṛtsu ca
GE07mbh_04_u:004.006-0105_003: tvayā rakṣā vidhātavyā kṛṣṇāyāḥ phālgunena ca
GE07mbh_04_u:004.006-0106_001: viditaṃ vo yathā sarvaṃ lokavṛttam idaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_04_u:004.006b-0107_001: eṣa dharmaś ca kāmaś ca arthaś caiva sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.007c: yathā rājakulaṃ prāpya caran preṣyo na riṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008a: durvasaṃ tv eva kauravyā jānatā rājaveśmani
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0109_002: bhartā goptā ca bhūtānāṃ rājā puruṣavigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0110_001: sarvātmanā vartamānaṃ yathā doṣo na saṃspṛśet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0111_001: kṣatriyaṃ caiva sarpaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca bahuśrutam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0111_002: nāvamanyeta medhāvī kṛśān api kadā cana
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0111_003: etat trayaṃ ca puruṣaṃ nirdahed avamānitam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0111_004: rājā tasmād budhair nityaṃ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0112_002: vyavahāraṃ punar loke maryādāṃ paṇḍitā viduḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0113_001: gacchann api parāṃ bhūmim apṛṣṭo hy aniyojitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.008d-0113_003: na hi putraṃ na naptāraṃ na bhrātaram ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.009a: diṣṭadvāro labhed dvāraṃ na ca rājasu viśvaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.009c: tad evāsanam anvicched yatra nābhiṣajet paraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.010a: nāsya yānaṃ na paryaṅkaṃ na pīṭhaṃ na gajaṃ ratham
GE07mbh_04_u:004.011c: na tatropaviśej jātu sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.012a: na cānuśiṣyed rājānam apṛcchantaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_04_u:004.012c: tūṣṇīṃ tv enam upāsīta kāle samabhipūjayan
GE07mbh_04_u:004.014a: naiṣāṃ dāreṣu kurvīta maitrīṃ prājñaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:004.014c: antaḥpuracarā ye ca dveṣṭi yānahitāś ca ye
GE07mbh_04_u:004.015a: vidite cāsya kurvīta kāryāṇi sulaghūny api
GE07mbh_04_u:004.015b-0114_001: na cāpi caraṇau prājñau dhunoj jātu bhujau kva cit
GE07mbh_04_u:004.015c: evaṃ vicarato rājño na kṣatir jāyate kva cit
GE07mbh_04_u:004.016a: yatnāc copacared enam agnivad devavac ca ha
GE07mbh_04_u:004.017c: pramādam avahelāṃ ca kopaṃ ca parivarjayet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.018a: samarthanāsu sarvāsu hitaṃ ca priyam eva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:004.018c: saṃvarṇayet tad evāsya priyād api hitaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.019a: anukūlo bhavec cāsya sarvārtheṣu kathāsu ca
GE07mbh_04_u:004.019c: apriyaṃ cāhitaṃ yat syāt tad asmai nānuvarṇayet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.020a: nāham asya priyo 'smīti matvā seveta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.020c: apramattaś ca yattaś ca hitaṃ kuryāt priyaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_04_u:004.021c: svasthānān na vikampeta sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.022a: dakṣiṇaṃ vātha vāmaṃ vā pārśvam āsīta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.022c: rakṣiṇāṃ hy āttaśastrāṇāṃ sthānaṃ paścād vidhīyate
GE07mbh_04_u:004.022e: nityaṃ vipratiṣiddhaṃ tu purastād āsanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_04_u:004.022f-0115_001: apramattaḥ sadā tiṣṭhed evaṃ rājñaḥ priyo bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.023a: na ca saṃdarśane kiṃ cit pravṛddham api saṃjapet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.023c: api hy etad daridrāṇāṃ vyalīkasthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.024c: yaṃ cāsūyanti rājānaḥ puruṣaṃ na vadec ca tam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.025a: śūro 'smīti na dṛptaḥ syād buddhimān iti vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.025c: priyam evācaran rājñaḥ priyo bhavati bhogavān
GE07mbh_04_u:004.026a: aiśvaryaṃ prāpya duṣprāpaṃ priyaṃ prāpya ca rājataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.026c: apramatto bhaved rājñaḥ priyeṣu ca hiteṣu ca
GE07mbh_04_u:004.027a: yasya kopo mahābādhaḥ prasādaś ca mahāphalaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.028a: na coṣṭhau nirbhujej jātu na ca vākyaṃ samākṣipet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.028c: sadā kṣutaṃ ca vātaṃ ca ṣṭhīvanaṃ cācarec chanaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.029a: hāsyavastuṣu cāpy asya vartamāneṣu keṣu cit
GE07mbh_04_u:004.029c: nātigāḍhaṃ prahṛṣyeta na cāpy unmattavad dhaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.030a: na cātidhairyeṇa cared gurutāṃ hi vrajet tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.031a: lābhe na harṣayed yas tu na vyathed yo 'vamānitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.031c: asaṃmūḍhaś ca yo nityaṃ sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.032a: rājānaṃ rājaputraṃ vā saṃvartayati yaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.032c: amātyaḥ paṇḍito bhūtvā sa ciraṃ tiṣṭhati śriyam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.033a: pragṛhītaś ca yo 'mātyo nigṛhītaś ca kāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.033c: na nirbadhnāti rājānaṃ labhate pragrahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.034a: pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣaṃ ca guṇavādī vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.034c: upajīvī bhaved rājño viṣaye cāpi yo vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.035a: amātyo hi balād bhoktuṃ rājānaṃ prārthayet tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.035c: na sa tiṣṭhec ciraṃ sthānaṃ gacchec ca prāṇasaṃśayam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.036a: śreyaḥ sadātmano dṛṣṭvā paraṃ rājñā na saṃvadet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.037c: satyavādī mṛdur dāntaḥ sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.038a: anyasmin preṣyamāṇe tu purastād yaḥ samutpatet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.038c: ahaṃ kiṃ karavāṇīti sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.039a: uṣṇe vā yadi vā śīte rātrau vā yadi vā divā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.039b-0117_001: abhāve caiva bhāve ca rājñā yaś caiva sarvadā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.039c: ādiṣṭo na vikalpeta sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.040a: yo vai gṛhebhyaḥ pravasan priyāṇāṃ nānusaṃsmaret
GE07mbh_04_u:004.040c: duḥkhena sukham anvicchet sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.040d-0118_001: samaṃ yānaṃ samaṃ bhojyaṃ nātyuccair bahudhā haset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.041a: samaveṣaṃ na kurvīta nātyuccaiḥ saṃnidhau haset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.041c: mantraṃ na bahudhā kuryād evaṃ rājñaḥ priyo bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.042a: na karmaṇi niyuktaḥ san dhanaṃ kiṃ cid upaspṛśet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.042c: prāpnoti hi haran dravyaṃ bandhanaṃ yadi vā vadham
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043a: yānaṃ vastram alaṃkāraṃ yac cānyat saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043c: tad eva dhārayen nityam evaṃ priyataro bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_004: (11cd) na tatropaviśej jātu yo rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_005: svabhūmau kāmam āsīta tiṣṭhed vā rājasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_006: na tv evāsanam anyasya prārthayeta kadā cana
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_009: (22ef) nityaṃ vipratiṣiddhaṃ tu purastād āsanaṃ matam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_010: arthārthaṃ hi yadā bhṛtyo rājānam upatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_011: (22ab) dakṣiṇaṃ vātha vāmaṃ vā bāhum āśritya paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_012: tiṣṭhed vinītavad rājan na purastān na pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_014: mātṛgotre svagotre vā nāmnā śīlena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_016: pūjyamāno 'pi yo rājñā naro na pratipūjayet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_018: (10ab) nāsya yugyaṃ na paryaṅkaṃ nāsanaṃ na rathaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_020: (40ab) yo vai gṛhebhyaḥ pravasan kriyamāṇam anusmaret
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_023: (40cd) duḥkhena sukham anvicched yo rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_025: (38cd) kariṣyāmy aham ity eva yaḥ sa rājasu sidhyati
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_026: (39ab) uṣṇe vā yadi vā śīte rātrau vā yadi vā divā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_027: (39cd) ādiṣṭo na vikalpeta yaḥ sa rājasu sidhyati
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_029: (37cd) ṛjur mṛduḥ satyavādī yaḥ sa rājasu sidhyati
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_030: (31ab) naiva lābhād dharṣam iyān na vyathec ca vimānitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_031: (31cd) samaḥ pūrṇatuleva syād yo rājavasatīṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_033: dakṣaḥ pradakṣiṇo dhīraḥ sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_035: vadānyaḥ satyavāk cāpi sa rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_036: (24ab) na mitho bhāṣitaṃ rājño manuṣyeṣu prakāśayet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_037: (24cd) yaṃ cāsūyanti rājānaḥ puruṣaṃ na vadec ca tam
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_038: (42ab) naiṣāṃ karmasu saṃyukto dhanaṃ kiṃ cid api spṛśet
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_039: (42cd) prāpnuyād ādadāno hi bandhaṃ vā vadham eva vā
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_041: anyaṃ puṣṇāti maddhīnam iti dhīro na muhyati
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_042: śreyāṃsaṃ hi parityajya vaidyaṃ karmaṇi karmaṇi
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_044: (14ab) naiṣāṃ dāreṣu kurvīta prājño maitrīṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_045: rakṣiṇaś ca na seveta yo rājavasatiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_047: buddhiṃ paribhavet tasya rājā śaṅketa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_048: śaṅkitasya punaḥ strīṣu kasya bhṛtyasya bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:004.043d-0120_050: (29ab) harṣavastuṣu cāpy atra vartamāneṣu keṣu cit

GE07mbh_04_u:006.009c: gotraṃ ca nāmāpi ca śaṃsa tattvataḥ; kiṃ cāpi śilpaṃ tava vidyate kṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:006.010a: yudhiṣṭhirasyāsam ahaṃ purā sakhā; vaiyāghrapadyaḥ punar asmi brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.010c: akṣān pravaptuṃ kuśalo 'smi devitā; kaṅketi nāmnāsmi virāṭa viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.011a: dadāmi te hanta varaṃ yam icchasi; praśādhi matsyān vaśago hy ahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_04_u:006.011c: priyā hi dhūrtā mama devinaḥ sadā; bhavāṃś ca devopama rājyam arhati
GE07mbh_04_u:006.012a: āpto vivādaḥ paramo viśāṃ pate; na vidyate kiṃ cana matsya hīnataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.012c: na me jitaḥ kaś cana dhārayed dhanaṃ; varo mamaiṣo 'stu tava prasādataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.013a: hanyām avadhyaṃ yadi te 'priyaṃ caret; pravrājayeyaṃ viṣayād dvijāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.013c: śṛṇvantu me jānapadāḥ samāgatāḥ; kaṅko yathāhaṃ viṣaye prabhus tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.014a: samānayāno bhavitāsi me sakhā; prabhūtavastro bahupānabhojanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.014c: paśyes tvam antaś ca bahiś ca sarvadā; kṛtaṃ ca te dvāram apāvṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015a: ye tvānuvādeyur avṛttikarśitā; brūyāś ca teṣāṃ vacanena me sadā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015c: dāsyāmi sarvaṃ tad ahaṃ na saṃśayo; na te bhayaṃ vidyati saṃnidhau mama
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_016: (4c) dvijāṃś ca ye cāsya sabhāsadas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_020: (3b) śriyā hy ayaṃ vaiśravaṇo dvijo yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_029: (5ab) kṣātraṃ ca rūpaṃ hi bibharty ayaṃ bhṛśaṃ gajendraśārdūlamaharṣabhopamaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_034: virāṭa ity evam uvāca taṃ prati
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_043: priyaṃ ca me darśanam īdṛśe jane
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_055: sa tena pūrvaṃ jayatāṃ bhavān iti
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_061: prāptaḥ kutas tvaṃ bhagavan kim icchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_062: kva yāsyase kiṃ karavāṇi te dvija
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_063: śrutaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca kulaṃ ca śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_064: (9c) gotraṃ tathā nāma ca deśam eva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_071: sarvāṃ ca bhūmiṃ tava dātum utsahe
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_077: satyaṃ vacaḥ ko nv iha vaktum utsahed
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_079: śrutaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca kulaṃ ca karma ca
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_080: śṛṇuṣva me janma ca deśam eva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_083: dvijo vratenāsmi na ca dvijaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_101: mayā kṛtaṃ tasya pure tu yat purā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_105: na me praśāntiṃ kva cid āśrayāmi vai
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_113: na me 'dya mātā na pitā na bāndhavā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_114: na me svarūpaṃ na ratir na saṃtatiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_115: sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca hi tulyam adya me
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_117: mukto 'smi kāmāc ca dhanāc ca sāṃprataṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_123: (10e) akṣān nivaptuṃ kuśalo hy ahaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_131: (11a) dadāmi te hanta varaṃ yad īpsitaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_134: (11d) tvaṃ cāpi devo mama rājyam arhasi
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_145: yac cāpi kiṃ cid vasu vidyate mama yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_146: prabhur bhavāṃs tasya vaśī vaseha ca
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_148: (12c) na me jitaṃ kiṃ cana dhāraye dhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_149: na bhojanaṃ kiṃ cana saṃspṛśe tv iha
GE07mbh_04_u:006.015d-0180_155: (12d) evaṃ varaṃ mātsya vṛṇe pravāritaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:006.016a: evaṃ sa labdhvā tu varaṃ samāgamaṃ; virāṭarājena nararṣabhas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:006.016c: uvāsa vīraḥ paramārcitaḥ sukhī; na cāpi kaś cic caritaṃ bubodha tat
GE07mbh_04_u:007.001a: athāparo bhīmabalaḥ śriyā jvalann; upāyayau siṃhavilāsavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.001c: khajaṃ ca darvīṃ ca kareṇa dhārayann; asiṃ ca kālāṅgam akośam avraṇam
GE07mbh_04_u:007.002a: sa sūdarūpaḥ parameṇa varcasā; ravir yathā lokam imaṃ prabhāsayan
GE07mbh_04_u:007.002c: sukṛṣṇavāsā girirājasāravān; sa matsyarājaṃ samupetya tasthivān
GE07mbh_04_u:007.003a: taṃ prekṣya rājā varayann upāgataṃ; tato 'bravīj jānapadān samāgatān
GE07mbh_04_u:007.003c: siṃhonnatāṃso 'yam atīva rūpavān; pradṛśyate ko nu nararṣabho yuvā
GE07mbh_04_u:007.003d-0185_009: rūpeṇa yaś cāpratimo hy ayaṃ mahān
GE07mbh_04_u:007.003d-0185_011: nābhūmipo 'yaṃ hi matir mameti ca vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.004a: adṛṣṭapūrvaḥ puruṣo ravir yathā; vitarkayan nāsya labhāmi saṃpadam
GE07mbh_04_u:007.004c: tathāsya cittaṃ hy api saṃvitarkayan; nararṣabhasyādya na yāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.005a: tato virāṭaṃ samupetya pāṇḍavaḥ; sudīnarūpo vacanaṃ mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.005c: uvāca sūdo 'smi narendra ballavo; bhajasva māṃ vyañjanakāram uttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:007.005d-0187_002: tvam eva loke paramo hi saṃśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.006a: na sūdatāṃ mānada śraddadhāmi te; sahasranetrapratimo hi dṛśyase
GE07mbh_04_u:007.006c: śriyā ca rūpeṇa ca vikrameṇa ca; prabhāsi tātānavaro nareṣv iha
GE07mbh_04_u:007.007a: narendra sūdaḥ paricārako 'smi te; jānāmi sūpān prathamena kevalān
GE07mbh_04_u:007.007b-0189_001: jānāmi sūpāṃś ca rasāṃś ca saṃskṛtān
GE07mbh_04_u:007.007b-0191_002: na karma te yogyam idaṃ mahānase
GE07mbh_04_u:007.007b-0191_003: na sūpakārī bhavituṃ tvam arhasi suparṇagandharvamahoragopamaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.007b-0191_008: praśāsituṃ bhūmim imāṃ tvam arhasi bhīmaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.007b-0191_010: na vai vṛṇe tvām aham īdṛśaṃ padam
GE07mbh_04_u:007.007c: āsvāditā ye nṛpate purābhavan; yudhiṣṭhireṇāpi nṛpeṇa sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.008a: balena tulyaś ca na vidyate mayā; niyuddhaśīlaś ca sadaiva pārthiva
GE07mbh_04_u:007.008c: gajaiś ca siṃhaiś ca sameyivān ahaṃ; sadā kariṣyāmi tavānagha priyam
GE07mbh_04_u:007.008d-0192_002: balasya netā tv abalo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_04_u:007.009a: dadāmi te hanta varaṃ mahānase; tathā ca kuryāḥ kuśalaṃ hi bhāṣase
GE07mbh_04_u:007.009c: na caiva manye tava karma tat samaṃ; samudranemiṃ pṛthivīṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_04_u:007.010a: yathā hi kāmas tava tat tathā kṛtaṃ; mahānase tvaṃ bhava me puraskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.010c: narāś ca ye tatra mamocitāḥ purā; bhavasva teṣām adhipo mayā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:007.011a: tathā sa bhīmo vihito mahānase; virāṭarājño dayito 'bhavad dṛḍham
GE07mbh_04_u:007.011c: uvāsa rājan na ca taṃ pṛthagjano; bubodha tatrānucaraś ca kaś cana vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:008.001-0194_001: tataḥ kṛṣṇā sukeśī sā darśanīyā śucismitā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.001b-0195_001: kṛṣṇān sūkṣmān mṛdūn dīrghān samudgrathya śucismitā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.002a: vāsaś ca paridhāyaikaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sumalinaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_04_u:008.002b-0196_001: naranāryaś ca saṃprekṣya vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.002c: kṛtvā veṣaṃ ca sairandhryāḥ kṛṣṇā vyacarad ārtavat
GE07mbh_04_u:008.003a: tāṃ narāḥ paridhāvantīṃ striyaś ca samupādravan
GE07mbh_04_u:008.003c: apṛcchaṃś caiva tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kā tvaṃ kiṃ ca cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_04_u:008.004a: sā tān uvāca rājendra sairandhry aham upāgatā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.004c: karma cecchāmi vai kartuṃ tasya yo māṃ pupukṣati
GE07mbh_04_u:008.005a: tasyā rūpeṇa veṣeṇa ślakṣṇayā ca tathā girā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0001: strībhiś ca puruṣaiś cāpi sarvataḥ parivāritām
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0003: apreṣayat samīpasthāḥ striyo vṛddhāś ca tatparāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0004: apanīya tataḥ sarvā ānayadhvam ihaiva tām
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0005: yadā dṛṣṭā mayā sādhvī kampate me manas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0008: ānīya sarvathā tv enām abruvan madhurāṃ giram
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0009: bhadre tvāṃ draṣṭum icchantī sudeṣṇā harmyabhūtale
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0010: sthitā tadarthaṃ hi vayaṃ tvatsamīpam ihāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0015: kuñcitāgrān susūkṣmāṃs tān darśanīyān nibadhya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0017: sā praviśya virāṭasya draupady antaḥpurāṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0027: tāḥ sarvā draupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃtaptāḥ paramāṅganāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0029: nirīkṣamāṇās tāḥ sarvāḥ śacīṃ devīm ivāgatām
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0034: tāṃ mṛgīm iva vitrastāṃ yūthabhraṣṭām iva dvipām
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0035: lakṣmīm iva viśālākṣīṃ vidyām iva yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0036: rohiṇīm iva tārāṇāṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0037: pārvatīm iva rudrāṇīṃ velām iva mahodadheḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0038: sulabhām iva nāgīnāṃ mṛgīṇām iva kiṃnarīm
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0039: gaṅgām iva viśuddhāṅgīṃ śāradīm iva śarvarīm
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0040: tām acintyatamāṃ loke ilām iva yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0041: sāvitrīm iva durdharṣāṃ brāhmyā lakṣmyā samanvitām
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0043: kā tvaṃ sarvānavadyāṅgī kuto 'si tvam ihāgatā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007b-006_0044: kasya vā tvaṃ viśālākṣi kiṃ vā te karavāṇy aham
GE07mbh_04_u:008.007c: samāhūyābravīd bhadre kā tvaṃ kiṃ ca cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_04_u:008.008a: sā tām uvāca rājendra sairandhry aham upāgatā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.008c: karma cecchāmy ahaṃ kartuṃ tasya yo māṃ pupukṣati sudeṣṇovāca
GE07mbh_04_u:008.009a: naivaṃrūpā bhavanty evaṃ yathā vadasi bhāmini
GE07mbh_04_u:008.009c: preṣayanti ca vai dāsīr dāsāṃś caivaṃvidhān bahūn
GE07mbh_04_u:008.013a: kā tvaṃ brūhi yathā bhadre nāsi dāsī kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:008.013c: yakṣī vā yadi vā devī gandharvī yadi vāpsarāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.013d-0202_002: vidyādharī kiṃnarī vā yadi vā rohiṇī svayam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.013d-0203_001: apsarā vāpi nāgī vā tārā vā tvaṃ vilāsini
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014b-0204_001: menakā vā ahalyā vā rambhā vāpi tilottamā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014c: indrāṇī vāruṇī vā tvaṃ tvaṣṭur dhātuḥ prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014e: devyo deveṣu vikhyātās tāsāṃ tvaṃ katamā śubhe
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014f-0205_001: tava hy anupamaṃ rūpaṃ bhūṣaṇair api varjitam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014f-0205_003: na tṛpyanti striyo dṛṣṭvā kā nu puṃsāṃ ratir bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014f-0206_002: tvām eva hi nirīkṣante vismitā rūpasaṃpadā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014f-0206_004: sarve tvām eva kalyāṇi nirīkṣante suvismitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014f-0206_005: na tvādṛśī kā cana me triṣu lokeṣu sundarī
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014f-0206_006: dṛṣṭapūrvā śrutā vāpi vapuṣā vidyate śubhe
GE07mbh_04_u:008.014f-0207_001: evam uktā sudeṣṇāṃ tāṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭā sthitā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.015a: nāsmi devī na gandharvī nāsurī na ca rākṣasī
GE07mbh_04_u:008.015c: sairandhrī tu bhujiṣyāsmi satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_04_u:008.015d-0208_002: keśapakṣe parāmṛṣṭā sāhaṃ trastā vanaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.015d-0208_004: carāmy anilayā subhru sā tavāntikam āgatā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.016a: keśāñ jānāmy ahaṃ kartuṃ piṃṣe sādhu vilepanam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.016b-0210_002: patraṃ mṛṇālam agaruṃ piṅkṣye ca haricandanam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.017c: kṛṣṇāṃ ca bhāryāṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ kurūṇām ekasundarīm
GE07mbh_04_u:008.018a: tatra tatra carāmy evaṃ labhamānā suśobhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.018c: vāsāṃsi yāvac ca labhe tāvat tāvad rame tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019a: mālinīty eva me nāma svayaṃ devī cakāra sā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0001: kṛṣṇā kamalapatrākṣī sā me prāṇasamā sakhī
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0002: na cāhaṃ ciram icchāmi kva cid vastuṃ śubhānane
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0004: yo hy asmākaṃ hared dravyaṃ deśaṃ vasanam eva vā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0005: na kroddhavyaṃ kilāsmābhir asmad gurur aroṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0006: sāhaṃ vanāni durgāṇi tīrthāni ca sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0007: śailāṃś ca vividhān ramyān saritaś ca samudragāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0013: māhātmyaṃ ca tataḥ śrutvā brāhmaṇānāṃ samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0014: tvām upasthātum icchāmi tataś cāham ihāgatā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0015: guravo mama dharmaś ca vāyuḥ śakras tathāśvinau
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019b-007_0016: teṣāṃ prasādāc ca na māṃ kaś cid dharṣayate pumān
GE07mbh_04_u:008.019c: sāham abhyāgatā devi sudeṣṇe tvanniveśanam sudeṣṇovāca
GE07mbh_04_u:008.020a: mūrdhni tvāṃ vāsayeyaṃ vai saṃśayo me na vidyate
GE07mbh_04_u:008.020c: no ced iha tu rājā tvāṃ gacchet sarveṇa cetasā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.020d-0212_001: sāhaṃ tvāṃ na kṣamāṃ manye vasantīm iha veśmani
GE07mbh_04_u:008.020d-0212_002: eṣa doṣo 'tra suśroṇi kathaṃ vā bhīru manyase
GE07mbh_04_u:008.021a: striyo rājakule paśya yāś cemā mama veśmani
GE07mbh_04_u:008.021c: prasaktās tvāṃ nirīkṣante pumāṃsaṃ kaṃ na mohayeḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.022a: vṛkṣāṃś cāvasthitān paśya ya ime mama veśmani
GE07mbh_04_u:008.022c: te 'pi tvāṃ saṃnamantīva pumāṃsaṃ kaṃ na mohayeḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.022d-0214_003: tava rūpam anindyāṅgi kiṃ punar mānavā bhuvi
GE07mbh_04_u:008.023a: rājā virāṭaḥ suśroṇi dṛṣṭvā vapur amānuṣam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.023c: vihāya māṃ varārohe tvāṃ gacchet sarvacetasā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024a: yaṃ hi tvam anavadyāṅgi naram āyatalocane
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_001: susnātālaṃkṛtā ca tvaṃ yam īkṣethā hi mānavam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_002: glānir na tasya duḥkhaṃ vā na tandrī na parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_003: na śocen na ca saṃtapyen na krudhyen nānṛtaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_005: na vyādhir na jarā tasya na tṛṣṇā na kṣudhā bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_006: yasya tvaṃ vaśagā subhru bhaver aṅkagatā satī
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_007: pañcatvam api saṃprāptaṃ yadi tvaṃ pariṣasvajeḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_008: bāhubhyām anurūpābhyāṃ sa jīved iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_009: yasya hi tvaṃ bhaver bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajeḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0215_010: atijīvet sa sarveṣu deveṣv iva puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.024d-0216_002: rājaveśmani te subhru gṛhe tu syāt tathā mama
GE07mbh_04_u:008.025a: yaś ca tvāṃ satataṃ paśyet puruṣaś cāruhāsini
GE07mbh_04_u:008.026a: yathā karkaṭakī garbham ādhatte mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.026c: tathāvidham ahaṃ manye vāsaṃ tava śucismite
GE07mbh_04_u:008.026d-0217_001: anumānaye tvāṃ sairandhri nāvamanye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:008.026d-0217_002: bhartṛśīlabhayād bhadre tava vāsaṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_04_u:008.027a: nāsmi labhyā virāṭena na cānyena kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:008.027c: gandharvāḥ patayo mahyaṃ yuvānaḥ pañca bhāmini
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028c: rakṣanti te ca māṃ nityaṃ duḥkhācārā tathā nv aham
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_001: yaś ca duḥśīlavān martyo māṃ spṛśed duṣṭacetasā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_002: sa tām eva niśāṃ śīghraṃ śayīta musalair hataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_003: yasyāpi hi śataṃ pūrṇaṃ bāndhavānāṃ bhaved iha
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_004: sahasraṃ vā viśālākṣi koṭir vāpi sahasrikā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_005: duṣṭacittaś ca māṃ brūyān na sa jīvet tavāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_006: na tasya tridaśā devā nāsurā na ca pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_008: sudeṣṇe viśvasa tvaṃ me svajane bāndhaveṣu vā
GE07mbh_04_u:008.028d-0219_009: nāhaṃ śakyā naraiḥ spraṣṭuṃ na ca me vṛttam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.029a: yo me na dadyād ucchiṣṭaṃ na ca pādau pradhāvayet
GE07mbh_04_u:008.029c: prīyeyus tena vāsena gandharvāḥ patayo mama
GE07mbh_04_u:008.030a: yo hi māṃ puruṣo gṛdhyed yathānyāḥ prākṛtastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.030c: tām eva sa tato rātriṃ praviśed aparāṃ tanum
GE07mbh_04_u:008.031a: na cāpy ahaṃ cālayituṃ śakyā kena cid aṅgane
GE07mbh_04_u:008.031c: duḥkhaśīlā hi gandharvās te ca me balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.031d-0220_001: pracchannāś cāpi rakṣanti te māṃ nityaṃ śucismite vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:008.031d-0221_001: evaṃ nivasamānāyāṃ mayi mā te bhayaṃ hy abhūt
GE07mbh_04_u:008.031d-0221_002: evam uktā tu sairandhryā sudeṣṇā vākyam abravīt sudeṣṇovāca
GE07mbh_04_u:008.032a: evaṃ tvāṃ vāsayiṣyāmi yathā tvaṃ nandinīcchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:008.032c: na ca pādau na cocchiṣṭaṃ sprakṣyasi tvaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:008.032d-0222_001: vaseha mayi kalyāṇi yadi te vṛttam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:008.032d-0222_002: kaś ca te dātum ucchiṣṭaṃ pumān arhati śobhane
GE07mbh_04_u:008.032d-0222_003: pradhāvayec ca kaḥ pādau lakṣmīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva buddhimān
GE07mbh_04_u:008.032d-0223_002: rakṣyā tvam asi bhūtānāṃ sāvitrīva dvijanmanām
GE07mbh_04_u:008.032d-0223_004: vasa bhadre mayi prītā prītir hi mama vartate
GE07mbh_04_u:008.033b-0225_002: yājñasenī sudeṣṇāṃ tu śuśrūṣantī viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:008.033c: na caināṃ veda tatrānyas tattvena janamejaya
GE07mbh_04_u:009.001c: bhāṣāṃ caiṣāṃ samāsthāya virāṭam upayād atha
GE07mbh_04_u:009.003a: kasya vā tvaṃ kuto vā tvaṃ kiṃ vā tāta cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_04_u:009.003c: na hi me dṛṣṭapūrvas tvaṃ tattvaṃ brūhi nararṣabha
GE07mbh_04_u:009.004a: sa prāpya rājānam amitratāpanas; tato 'bravīn meghamahaughaniḥsvanaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.004b-008_0017: mayā hi guptāḥ paśavo bhavantu te
GE07mbh_04_u:009.004b-008_0019: na śvāpadebhyo na ca rogato bhayaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.004b-008_0020: na cāpi tāsām uta taskarād bhayam
GE07mbh_04_u:009.004b-008_0027: dhairyād vapuḥ kṣātram iveha te dṛḍhaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.004b-008_0033: balaṃ ca me rakṣa suveṣa sarvaśo
GE07mbh_04_u:009.004c: vaiśyo 'smi nāmnāham ariṣṭanemir; gosaṃkhya āsaṃ kurupuṃgavānām
GE07mbh_04_u:009.005a: vastuṃ tvayīcchāmi viśāṃ variṣṭha; tān rājasiṃhān na hi vedmi pārthān
GE07mbh_04_u:009.005c: na śakyate jīvitum anyakarmaṇā; na ca tvad anyo mama rocate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.006a: tvaṃ brāhmaṇo yadi vā kṣatriyo 'si; samudranemīśvararūpavān asi
GE07mbh_04_u:009.006c: ācakṣva me tattvam amitrakarśana; na vaiśyakarma tvayi vidyate samam
GE07mbh_04_u:009.007a: kasyāsi rājño viṣayād ihāgataḥ; kiṃ cāpi śilpaṃ tava vidyate kṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:009.007c: kathaṃ tvam asmāsu nivatsyase sadā; vadasva kiṃ cāpi taveha vetanam
GE07mbh_04_u:009.009c: teṣāṃ gosaṃkhya āsaṃ vai tantipāleti māṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.010a: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca yac ca saṃkhyāgataṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_04_u:009.010c: na me 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cit samantād daśayojanam
GE07mbh_04_u:009.011a: guṇāḥ suviditā hy āsan mama tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.011c: āsīc ca sa mayā tuṣṭaḥ kururājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.012a: kṣipraṃ hi gāvo bahulā bhavanti; na tāsu rogo bhavatīha kaś cit
GE07mbh_04_u:009.012c: tais tair upāyair viditaṃ mayaitad; etāni śilpāni mayi sthitāni
GE07mbh_04_u:009.013c: yeṣāṃ mūtram upāghrāya api vandhyā prasūyate vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.013d-0229_005: atha tv idānīṃ tava rocitaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_04_u:009.014a: śataṃ sahasrāṇi samāhitāni; varṇasya varṇasya viniścitā guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.014c: paśūn sapālān bhavate dadāmy ahaṃ; tvadāśrayā me paśavo bhavantv iha
GE07mbh_04_u:009.015a: tathā sa rājño 'vidito viśāṃ pate; uvāsa tatraiva sukhaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:009.015c: na cainam anye 'pi viduḥ kathaṃ cana; prādāc ca tasmai bharaṇaṃ yathepsitam
GE07mbh_04_u:010.001c: prākāravapre pratimucya kuṇḍale; dīrghe ca kambū parihāṭake śubhe
GE07mbh_04_u:010.001d-0231_001: kṛṣṇe ca dīrghe ca nibadhya vāsasī
GE07mbh_04_u:010.002a: bahūṃś ca dīrghāṃś ca vikīrya mūrdhajān; mahābhujo vāraṇamattavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.002b-0232_001: klaibyena veṣeṇa na bhāti bhāti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:010.002c: gatena bhūmim abhikampayaṃs tadā; virāṭam āsādya sabhāsamīpataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.003a: taṃ prekṣya rājopagataṃ sabhātale; satrapraticchannam aripramāthinam
GE07mbh_04_u:010.003c: virājamānaṃ parameṇa varcasā; sutaṃ mahendrasya gajendravikramam
GE07mbh_04_u:010.004a: sarvān apṛcchac ca samīpacāriṇaḥ; kuto 'yam āyāti na me purā śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.004c: na cainam ūcur viditaṃ tadā narāḥ; savismitaṃ vākyam idaṃ nṛpo 'bravīt virāṭaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.004d-009_0008: prekṣyainam āsīd iti me pratarkaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.005a: sarvopapannaḥ puruṣo manoramaḥ; śyāmo yuvā vāraṇayūthapopamaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.005b-0233_008: bhavāmi te pārthiva nartakī hy aham
GE07mbh_04_u:010.005c: vimucya kambū parihāṭake śubhe; vimucya veṇīm apinahya kuṇḍale
GE07mbh_04_u:010.006a: śikhī sukeśaḥ paridhāya cānyathā; bhavasva dhanvī kavacī śarī tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:010.006c: āruhya yānaṃ paridhāvatāṃ bhavān; sutaiḥ samo me bhava vā mayā samaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.007a: vṛddho hy ahaṃ vai parihārakāmaḥ; sarvān matsyāṃs tarasā pālayasva
GE07mbh_04_u:010.007c: naivaṃvidhāḥ klībarūpā bhavanti; kathaṃ caneti pratibhāti me manaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.007d-0234_007: dhanur hi manye tava śobhayed bhujau
GE07mbh_04_u:010.007d-0234_013: tvaṃ rakṣa me sarvam idaṃ puraṃ prabho
GE07mbh_04_u:010.007d-0234_022: na me dhanur dhāritam īdṛśaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_04_u:010.007d-0234_023: na cāpi dṛṣṭaṃ dhanur īdṛśaṃ kva cin
GE07mbh_04_u:010.008a: gāyāmi nṛtyāmy atha vādayāmi; bhadro 'smi nṛtte kuśalo 'smi gīte
GE07mbh_04_u:010.008c: tvam uttarāyāḥ paridatsva māṃ svayaṃ; bhavāmi devyā naradeva nartakaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.009a: idaṃ tu rūpaṃ mama yena kiṃ nu tat; prakīrtayitvā bhṛśaśokavardhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:010.009c: bṛhannaḍāṃ vai naradeva viddhi māṃ; sutaṃ sutāṃ vā pitṛmātṛvarjitām
GE07mbh_04_u:010.010a: dadāmi te hanta varaṃ bṛhannaḍe; sutāṃ ca me nartaya yāś ca tādṛśīḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.010c: idaṃ tu te karma samaṃ na me mataṃ; samudranemiṃ pṛthivīṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_04_u:010.010d-0236_009: na duṣkulīnā tv iyam ākṛtir bhaven
GE07mbh_04_u:010.010d-0237_003: sutāṃ ca tāṃ nartayituṃ śaśāsa vai
GE07mbh_04_u:010.011a: bṛhannaḍāṃ tām abhivīkṣya matsyarāṭ; kalāsu nṛtte ca tathaiva vādite
GE07mbh_04_u:010.011c: apuṃstvam apy asya niśamya ca sthiraṃ; tataḥ kumārīpuram utsasarja tam
GE07mbh_04_u:010.012a: sa śikṣayām āsa ca gītavāditaṃ; sutāṃ virāṭasya dhanaṃjayaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.012c: sakhīś ca tasyāḥ paricārikās tathā; priyaś ca tāsāṃ sa babhūva pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:010.013a: tathā sa satreṇa dhanaṃjayo 'vasat; priyāṇi kurvan saha tābhir ātmavān
GE07mbh_04_u:010.013c: tathāgataṃ tatra na jajñire janā; bahiścarā vāpy athavāntarecarāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.001a: athāparo 'dṛśyata pāṇḍavaḥ prabhur; virāṭarājñas turagān samīkṣataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.001c: tam āpatantaṃ dadṛśe pṛthagjano; vimuktam abhrād iva sūryamaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_04_u:011.002a: sa vai hayān aikṣata tāṃs tatas tataḥ; samīkṣamāṇaṃ ca dadarśa matsyarāṭ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.002c: tato 'bravīt tān anugān amitrahā; kuto 'yam āyāti naro 'maraprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.002d-0240_006: bravītu kaś cid yadi dṛṣṭavān imam
GE07mbh_04_u:011.003a: ayaṃ hayān vīkṣati māmakān dṛḍhaṃ; dhruvaṃ hayajño bhavitā vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.003c: praveśyatām eṣa samīpam āśu me; vibhāti vīro hi yathāmaras tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:011.004a: abhyetya rājānam amitrahābravīj; jayo 'stu te pārthiva bhadram astu ca
GE07mbh_04_u:011.004c: hayeṣu yukto nṛpa saṃmataḥ sadā; tavāśvasūto nipuṇo bhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_04_u:011.005a: dadāmi yānāni dhanaṃ niveśanaṃ; mamāśvasūto bhavituṃ arhasi
GE07mbh_04_u:011.005c: kuto 'si kasyāsi kathaṃ tvam āgataḥ; prabrūhi śilpaṃ tava vidyate ca yat
GE07mbh_04_u:011.007a: aśvānāṃ prakṛtiṃ vedmi vinayaṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.007c: duṣṭānāṃ pratipattiṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ caiva cikitsitam
GE07mbh_04_u:011.008a: na kātaraṃ syān mama jātu vāhanaṃ; na me 'sti duṣṭā vaḍavā kuto hayāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.008c: janas tu mām āha sa cāpi pāṇḍavo; yudhiṣṭhiro granthikam eva nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.008d-0242_001: mātalir iva devapater daśarathanṛpateḥ sumantra iva yantā
GE07mbh_04_u:011.008d-0242_002: sahasāho jāmadagnes tathaiva tava śikṣayāmy aśvān
GE07mbh_04_u:011.009a: yad asti kiṃ cin mama vājivāhanaṃ; tad astu sarvaṃ tvadadhīnam adya vai
GE07mbh_04_u:011.009c: ye cāpi ke cin mama vājiyojakās; tvadāśrayāḥ sārathayaś ca santu me
GE07mbh_04_u:011.010a: idaṃ taveṣṭaṃ yadi vai suropama; bravīhi yat te prasamīkṣitaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_04_u:011.010c: na te 'nurūpaṃ hayakarma vidyate; prabhāsi rājeva hi saṃmato mama
GE07mbh_04_u:011.011a: yudhiṣṭhirasyeva hi darśanena me; samaṃ tavedaṃ priyadarśa darśanam
GE07mbh_04_u:011.011c: kathaṃ tu bhṛtyaiḥ sa vinākṛto vane; vasaty anindyo ramate ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.012a: tathā sa gandharvavaropamo yuvā; virāṭarājñā muditena pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:011.012c: na cainam anye 'pi viduḥ kathaṃ cana; priyābhirāmaṃ vicarantam antarā
GE07mbh_04_u:011.013a: evaṃ hi matsye nyavasanta pāṇḍavā; yathāpratijñābhir amoghadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.001a: evaṃ matsyasya nagare vasantas tatra pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.001c: ata ūrdhvaṃ mahāvīryāḥ kim akurvanta vai dvija
GE07mbh_04_u:012.002a: evaṃ te nyavasaṃs tatra pracchannāḥ kurunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.002c: ārādhayanto rājānaṃ yad akurvanta tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_04_u:012.003c: tathaiva ca virāṭasya saputrasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:012.004a: sa hy akṣahṛdayajñas tān krīḍayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.005a: ajñātaṃ ca virāṭasya vijitya vasu dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.008b-0244_001: adhyakṣatvāc ca yal lebhe rājñaḥ kalyāṇakāryavān
GE07mbh_04_u:012.008c: dadhi kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva pāṇḍavebhyaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_04_u:012.009a: nakulo 'pi dhanaṃ labdhvā kṛte karmaṇi vājinām
GE07mbh_04_u:012.009d-0245_002: sa tu hṛṣṭaś ca saṃprādāt tadā rājā dhanaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_04_u:012.010a: kṛṣṇāpi sarvān bhrātṝṃs tān nirīkṣantī tapasvinī
GE07mbh_04_u:012.010c: yathā punar avijñātā tathā carati bhāminī
GE07mbh_04_u:012.011c: prekṣamāṇās tadā kṛṣṇām ūṣuś channā narādhipa
GE07mbh_04_u:012.012a: atha māse caturthe tu brahmaṇaḥ sumahotsavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.013a: tatra mallāḥ samāpetur digbhyo rājan sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.013b-0247_001: samāje brahmaṇo rājaṃs tathā paśupater api
GE07mbh_04_u:012.015a: teṣām eko mahān āsīt sarvamallān samāhvayat
GE07mbh_04_u:012.015c: āvalgamānaṃ taṃ raṅge nopatiṣṭhati kaś cana
GE07mbh_04_u:012.015d-0248_001: kīcako 'pi tadā mallaṃ vyaśeṣayata no balāt
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016a: yadā sarve vimanasas te mallā hatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0001: avāṅmukhāś ca bhītāś ca mallāś cānye vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0003: gāṃ praveṣṭum ivecchanti khaṃ gantum iva cotthitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0006: mallendranihatāḥ sarve na kiṃ cit pravadanti te
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0007: malla udvīkṣya tān mallāṃs trastān vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0011: virāṭo vīkṣya tān mallāṃs trastān vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0012: anena saha mallena ko yoddhuṃ śaktimān naraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0014: asti mallo mahārāja mayā dṛṣṭo yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0015: anena saha mallena yoddhuṃ śaknoti bhūpate
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0016: yo 'sau mallo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ yaudhiṣṭhire pure
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0017: so 'yaṃ mallo vasaty eṣa rājaṃs tava mahānase
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0019: so 'py athāhūyatāṃ kṣipraṃ yoddhuṃ mallena saṃsadi
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0021: yoddhuṃ tato 'bravīd vākyaṃ yoddhuṃ śaknomi bhūpate
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0022: narendra te prabhāvena śriyā śaktyā ca śāsanāt
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0023: anena saha mallena yoddhuṃ rājendra śaknuyām
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0024: yudhiṣṭhirakṛtaṃ jñātvā śriyā tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0025: mahādevasya bhaktyā ca taṃ mallaṃ pātayāmy aham
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016b-010_0026: codito bhīmasenas tu mallam āhūya maṇḍale
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016c: atha sūdena taṃ mallaṃ yodhayām āsa matsyarāṭ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016d-0249_001: ubhābhyām eva gharṣo 'bhūd yathā śailau parasparam
GE07mbh_04_u:012.016d-0250_001: kīcako 'pi tadā mallaṃ yodhayām āsa matsyarāṭ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.017c: na hi śaknoti vivṛte pratyākhyātuṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_04_u:012.019a: babandha kakṣyāṃ kaunteyas tatas taṃ harṣayañ janam
GE07mbh_04_u:012.019c: tatas taṃ vṛtrasaṃkāśaṃ bhīmo mallaṃ samāhvayat
GE07mbh_04_u:012.019d-0251_001: jīmūtaṃ nāma taṃ tatra mallaṃ prakhyātavikramam
GE07mbh_04_u:012.019d-0252_001: kakṣe mallaṃ gṛhītvā tu nanāda bhuvi siṃhavat
GE07mbh_04_u:012.020d-011_0010: talair vajranipātaiś ca prasṛṣṭābhis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:012.020d-011_0013: tad yuddham abhavad ghoram aśastraṃ bāhutejasā
GE07mbh_04_u:012.021a: cakarṣa dorbhyām utpāṭya bhīmo mallam amitrahā
GE07mbh_04_u:012.022a: tam udyamya mahābāhur bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
GE07mbh_04_u:012.022c: tato mallāś ca matsyāś ca vismayaṃ cakrire param
GE07mbh_04_u:012.024c: virāṭaḥ paramaṃ harṣam agacchad bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:012.025a: saṃharṣāt pradadau vittaṃ bahu rājā mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.026a: evaṃ sa subahūn mallān puruṣāṃś ca mahābalān
GE07mbh_04_u:012.027a: yadāsya tulyaḥ puruṣo na kaś cit tatra vidyate
GE07mbh_04_u:012.027c: tato vyāghraiś ca siṃhaiś ca dviradaiś cāpy ayodhayat
GE07mbh_04_u:012.027d-0255_002: sthitebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaś ca dattvā dravyāṇi jagmivān
GE07mbh_04_u:012.028c: yodhyate sma virāṭena siṃhair mattair mahābalaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.029a: bībhatsur api gītena sunṛttena ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.030a: aśvair vinītair javanais tatra tatra samāgataiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031a: tasmai pradeyaṃ prāyacchat prīto rājā dhanaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031b-0256_001: arogā bahulakṣīrā dṛṣṭvā gās tā narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031b-0256_002: prītaḥ prādān mahāvittaṃ matsyarājo balī mahān
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031d-0258_001: tathaiva pradadau vittam anekaṃ matsyarāṭ svayam
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031d-0259_001: dhanaṃ prādāt subahulaṃ tasya tuṣṭaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031d-0260_001: gāvaḥ prasūtā vatsaiś ca virāṭo vismito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031d-0261_001: tasmin kāle dadau tasmai dhanaṃ prīto nṛpo bahu
GE07mbh_04_u:012.031d-0262_001: draupadī prekṣya tān sarvān kliśyamānān mahārathān
GE07mbh_04_u:012.032a: evaṃ te nyavasaṃs tatra pracchannāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.002a: yājñasenī sudeṣṇāṃ tu śuśrūṣantī viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:013.003b-0263_001: tāṃ devīṃ toṣayām āsa tathā cāntaḥpurastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.003b-0263_002: tasmin varṣe gataprāye kīcakas tu mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.004a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā devagarbhābhāṃ carantīṃ devatām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:013.005a: sa tu kāmāgnisaṃtaptaḥ sudeṣṇām abhigamya vai
GE07mbh_04_u:013.005c: prahasann iva senānīr idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:013.006a: neyaṃ purā jātu mayeha dṛṣṭā; rājño virāṭasya niveśane śubhā
GE07mbh_04_u:013.006c: rūpeṇa conmādayatīva māṃ bhṛśaṃ; gandhena jātā madireva bhāminī
GE07mbh_04_u:013.007a: kā devarūpā hṛdayaṃgamā śubhe; ācakṣva me kā ca kutaś ca śobhanā
GE07mbh_04_u:013.007c: cittaṃ hi nirmathya karoti māṃ vaśe; na cānyad atrauṣadham adya me matam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.008a: aho taveyaṃ paricārikā śubhā; pratyagrarūpā pratibhāti mām iyam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.008c: ayuktarūpaṃ hi karoti karma te; praśāstu māṃ yac ca mamāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:013.009c: manoharaṃ kāñcanacitrabhūṣaṇaṃ; gṛhaṃ mahac chobhayatām iyaṃ mama
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010a: tataḥ sudeṣṇām anumantrya kīcakas; tataḥ samabhyetya narādhipātmajām
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010c: uvāca kṛṣṇām abhisāntvayaṃs tadā; mṛgendrakanyām iva jambuko vane
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0001: kā tvaṃ kasyāsi kalyāṇi kuto vā tvaṃ varānane
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0003: rūpam agryaṃ tathā kāntiḥ saukumāryam anuttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0004: kāntyā vibhāti vaktraṃ te śaśāṅka iva nirmalam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0007: evaṃrūpā mayā nārī kā cid anyā mahītale
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0008: na dṛṣṭapūrvā suśroṇi yādṛśī tvam anindite
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0009: lakṣmīḥ padmālayā kiṃ tvam atha bhūtiḥ sumadhyame
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0010: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtir atho kāntir āsāṃ kā tvaṃ varānane
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0016: kṛtsne jagati ko neha kāmasya vaśago bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0018: sujātau sahitau lakṣmyā pīnau vṛttau nirantarau
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0024: kāmavyādhir asādhyo mām apy ākrāmati bhāmini
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0036: kāmaṃ prakāmaṃ seva tvaṃ mayā saha vilāsini
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0038: prāpnuhy anuttamaṃ saukhyaṃ mattas tvaṃ mattagāmini
GE07mbh_04_u:013.010d-012_0042: pānaṃ piba mahābhāge bhogaiś cānuttamaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.011a: idaṃ ca rūpaṃ prathamaṃ ca te vayo; nirarthakaṃ kevalam adya bhāmini
GE07mbh_04_u:013.011c: adhāryamāṇā srag ivottamā yathā; na śobhase sundari śobhanā satī
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012a: tyajāmi dārān mama ye purātanā; bhavantu dāsyas tava cāruhāsini
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012c: ahaṃ ca te sundari dāsavat sthitaḥ; sadā bhaviṣye vaśago varānane
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-0267_001: (6a) na tvaṃ purā jātu mayeha dṛṣṭā
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-0267_013: anyā hi nāryas tava karma kuryuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-0267_018: (12cd) bhavāmi dāsaś ca vaśānugaś ca te
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-0267_026: (9d) parair hi cādyaiva mamottamaṃ gṛham prāsādamālāgraviśālatoraṇaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-0267_032: tvam asya sarvasya sugātri bhājanam prabhūtaśayyāsanapānabhojanaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-013_0013: aprāpya tu tvām aham adya śobhane
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-013_0017: priyāṃś ca dārān sasutān kulaṃ dhanaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-013_0018: yaśaś ca kīrtir hy atha vāpi jīvitam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-013_0019: tyajāmi sarvaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca yat kṛtaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.012d-013_0024: yathā na śuṣye na patāmy acetanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_001: etenaiva ca vittena yatnena ca manoramā
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_003: sveṣu dāreṣu medhāvī kurute yatnam uttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_004: svadāranirato hy āśu naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_005: paradārarato martyo na ca bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_006: na cādharmeṇa lipyeta na cākīrtim avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_008: svajātidārā martyasya iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_010: tad akṣayaṃ ca dharmyaṃ ca svargyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.013d-0269_012: te kṣetrajāś ca putrāś ca śrūyante kulavardhanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.014a: paradārāsmi bhadraṃ te na yuktaṃ tvayi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.014b-0270_001: spraṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca vā sūta kāmadagdhena cetasā
GE07mbh_04_u:013.014b-0270_002: māṃ hi tvam abhimanvānaḥ sūtaputra naśiṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:013.015a: paradāre na te buddhir jātu kāryā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016a: mithyābhigṛdhno hi naraḥ pāpātmā moham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016c: ayaśaḥ prāpnuyād ghoraṃ sumahat prāpnuyād bhayam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-0271_002: patanti pitaraś caiva svayaṃ paścāt pataty adhaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0001: evam uktas tu sairandhryā kīcakaḥ kāmamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0007: pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru vaśagaṃ priyavādinam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0009: ahaṃ hi subhru rājyasya kṛtsnasyāsya sumadhyame
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0010: prabhur vāsayitā caiva vīrye cāpratimaḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0011: pṛthivyāṃ matsamo nāsti kaś cid anyaḥ pumān iha
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0014: bhoktavyeṣu ca kalyāṇi kasmād dāsye ratā hy asi
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0015: mayā dattam idaṃ rājyaṃ svāminy asmiñ śubhānane
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0016: bhajasva māṃ varārohe bhuṅkṣva bhogān anuttamān
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0017: evam uktā tu sā sādhvī kīcakenāśubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.016d-014_0018: kīcakaṃ pratyuvācedaṃ garhayanty asya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.017a: mā sūtaputra hṛṣyasva mādya tyakṣyasi jīvitam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.017d-0272_001: patiṣyasy avaśas tūrṇaṃ vṛntāt tālaphalaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:013.018a: na cāpy ahaṃ tvayā śakyā gandharvāḥ patayo mama
GE07mbh_04_u:013.018c: te tvāṃ nihanyuḥ kupitāḥ sādhv alaṃ mā vyanīnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.018d-0275_001: ko 'yaṃ kaṇṭhe śilāṃ baddhvā tartum icchati sāgaram
GE07mbh_04_u:013.018d-0275_002: kena śakyaṃ viṣaṃ bhoktuṃ cāsyate puruṣādhama
GE07mbh_04_u:013.018d-0276_001: sītārthaṃ hi daśagrīvaṃ yathā rāmaḥ sabāndhavam
GE07mbh_04_u:013.018d-0277_001: rāmo hatvā tu muditas tathā tvāṃ patayo mama
GE07mbh_04_u:013.019c: yathā niścetano bālaḥ kūlasthaḥ kūlam uttaram
GE07mbh_04_u:013.019e: tartum icchati mandātmā tathā tvaṃ kartum icchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:013.020a: antarmahīṃ vā yadi vordhvam utpateḥ; samudrapāraṃ yadi vā pradhāvasi
GE07mbh_04_u:013.020c: tathāpi teṣāṃ na vimokṣam arhasi; pramāthino devasutā hi me varāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021a: tvaṃ kālarātrīm iva kaś cid āturaḥ; kiṃ māṃ dṛḍhaṃ prārthayase 'dya kīcaka
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021b-0278_001: teṣāṃ priyāṃ prārthayato na te bhuvi
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021b-0278_003: na vartate kīcaka te dṛśā śubhaṃ
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021b-0279_001: pāpaṃ na vetsi na nayaṃ durātman
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021c: kiṃ mātur aṅke śayito yathā śiśuś; candraṃ jighṛkṣur iva manyase hi mām
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021d-0280_001: yo mām ajñāya kāmārtaḥ abaddhāni prabhāṣate
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021d-0280_002: aśaktas tu pumāñ śailaṃ na laṅghayitum arhati
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021d-0280_007: juhvañ japan vā prapatan gires taṭe
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021d-0280_014: na māṃ balāt prāpsyasi durlabhāṃ satīm
GE07mbh_04_u:013.021d-0281_001: tvaṃ kālarātrīm iva kaś cid āturaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.001b-0283_001: praviśya rājño bhavanaṃ bhaginyā agrataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.001d-0284_001: sa tu mūrdhny añjaliṃ kṛtvā bhaginyāś caraṇāv ubhau
GE07mbh_04_u:014.001d-0284_003: provāca hi suduḥkhārto bhaginīṃ niḥśvasan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.001d-0284_004: avyaktamṛdunā sāmnā śuṣyatā ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002a: yathā kaikeyi sairandhryā sameyāṃ tad vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002c: tāṃ sudeṣṇe parīpsasva māhaṃ prāṇān prahāsiṣam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0001: yadīyam anavadyāṅgi na mām adyābhikāṅkṣate vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0003: tam uvāca pariṣvajya sudeṣṇā bhrātaraṃ priyam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0004: śaraṇāgateyaṃ suśroṇī mayā dattābhayā ca sā
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0005: śubhācārā ca bhadraṃ te naināṃ vaktum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0006: naiṣā śakyā hi cānyena spraṣṭuṃ pāpena cetasā
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0007: gandharvāḥ kila pañcaināṃ rakṣanti ramayanti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0010: te hi kruddhā mahātmāno nāśayeyur hi jīvitam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0011: rājā caiva samīkṣyaināṃ saṃmohaṃ gatavān iha
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0015: manasāpi tatas tv enāṃ na cintayati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0017: daheyur api lokāṃs trīn yugānteṣv iva bhāskarāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0018: sairandhryā hy etad ākhyātaṃ mama teṣāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0019: tava cāham idaṃ guhyaṃ snehād ākhyāmi bandhuvat
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0020: mā gamiṣyasi vai kṛcchrāṃ gatiṃ paramadurgamām
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0021: balinas te rujaṃ kuryuḥ kulasya ca janasya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0022: tasmān nāsyāṃ manaḥ kartuṃ yadi prāṇāḥ priyās tava
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0023: mā cintayethā mā gās tvaṃ matpriyaṃ ca yadīcchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0024: evam uktas tu duṣṭātmā bhaginīṃ kīcako 'bravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0025: gandharvāṇāṃ śataṃ vāpi sahasram ayutāni vā
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0026: aham eko haniṣyāmi gandharvān pañca kiṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0027: na ca tvam abhijānīṣe strīṇāṃ guhyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0028: putraṃ vā kila pautraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā manasvinī
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0030: yonir utsvidyate strīṇām asatīnāṃ mayā śrutam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0031: sā tvaṃ dhruvaṃ brūhi caināṃ mama cecchasi jīvitam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0033: aho duḥkham aho kṛcchram aho pāpam iti sma ha
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0034: prārudad bhṛśaduḥkhārtā vipākaṃ tasya vīkṣya sā
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0036: tvatkṛte vinaśiṣyanti bhrātaraḥ suhṛdaś ca me
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0037: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ yat tvam evam abhiplutaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0039: dhruvaṃ gatāyus tvaṃ pāpa yad evaṃ kāmamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0040: akartavye hi māṃ pāpe viyunaṅkṣi narādhama
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0041: api caitat purā proktaṃ nipuṇair manujottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0042: ekas tu kurute pāpaṃ svajātis tena hanyate
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0043: gatas tvaṃ dharmarājasya viṣayaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0045: etat tu me duḥkhataraṃ yenāhaṃ bhrātṛsauhṛdāt
GE07mbh_04_u:014.002d-015_0047: gaccha śīghram itas tvaṃ hi svam eva bhavanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_04_u:014.003a: tasya tāṃ bahuśaḥ śrutvā vācaṃ vilapatas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:014.004a: svam artham abhisaṃdhāya tasyārtham anucintya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:014.004c: udvegaṃ caiva kṛṣṇāyāḥ sudeṣṇā sūtam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:014.005a: parviṇīṃ tvaṃ samuddiṣya surām annaṃ ca kāraya
GE07mbh_04_u:014.005b-0286_001: kṛte cānne surāyāṃ ca preṣayiṣyasi me punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.006d-0287_001: sadyaḥ kṛtam idaṃ sarvaṃ śeṣam atrānucintaya
GE07mbh_04_u:014.007a: kīcakas tu gṛhaṃ gatvā bhaginyā vacanāt tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:014.007d-0288_003: āgamya ca gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ surām annaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_04_u:014.008a: ājaurabhraṃ ca subhṛśaṃ bahūṃś coccāvacān mṛgān
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_001: tvarāvān kālapāśena kaṇṭhe baddhaḥ paśur yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_003: ānītāyāṃ surāyāṃ tu kṛte cānne susaṃskṛte kīcakaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_004: kīcakaḥ punar āgamya sudeṣṇāṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_005: madhumāṃsaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhakṣyāś ca vividhāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_006: sudeṣṇe brūhi sairandhrīṃ yathā sā me gṛhaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_007: kena cit tv adya kāryeṇa tvara śīghraṃ mama priyam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_008: ahaṃ hi śaraṇaṃ devaṃ prapadye vṛṣabhadhvajam
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_009: samāgamaṃ me sairandhryā maraṇaṃ vā diśed iti vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_010: sā tam āha viniḥśvasya pratigaccha svakaṃ gṛham
GE07mbh_04_u:014.009d-0289_011: eṣāham api sairandhrīṃ surārthaṃ tūrṇam ādiśam

GE07mbh_04_u:015.029d-0333_012: surūpiṇī suvadanā neyaṃ yogyā padā vadham
GE07mbh_04_u:015.029d-0333_014: apsarā iva saurūpyān neyaṃ yogyā padā vadham
GE07mbh_04_u:015.030a: evaṃ saṃpūjayaṃs tatra kṛṣṇāṃ prekṣya sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.030c: yudhiṣṭhirasya kopāt tu lalāṭe sveda āsajat
GE07mbh_04_u:015.031c: gaccha sairandhri mātra sthāḥ sudeṣṇāyā niveśanam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.031d-0335_001: rājā hy ayaṃ dharmaśīlo virāṭaḥ paralokabhīḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.031d-0335_002: yatas tvāṃ na paritrāti satye dharmavrate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033a: manye na kālaṃ krodhasya paśyanti patayas tava
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0003: nāsti yajñaḥ striyaḥ kaś cin na śrāddhaṃ nāpy upoṣaṇam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0004: yā tu bhartari śuśrūṣā sā svargāyābhijāyate
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0005: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0006: putras tu sthavirībhāve na strī svātantryam arhati
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0009: bhartṝn prati tathā patnyo na krudhyanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0010: bahubhiś ca parikleśair avijñātāś ca śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0012: na krodhakālaṃ niyataṃ paśyanti patayas tava
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0013: na kruddhān pratiyāyād vai patīṃs te vṛtrahā api
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0015: yadi te samayaḥ kaś cit kṛto hy āyatalocane
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0016: taṃ smarasva kṣamāśīle kṣamā dharmo hy anuttamaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0017: kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā tapaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.033d-017_0020: ity evam ukte tiṣṭhantīṃ punar evāha dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.034b-0336_001: evam uktā tu sā bhadrā samudvīkṣyābravīd idam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.034e: gaccha sairandhri gandharvāḥ kariṣyanti tava priyam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.034f-0337_001: vyapaneṣyanti te duḥkhaṃ yena te vipriyaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.035c: tasya tasyeha te vadhyā yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭho 'kṣadevitā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.036a: ity uktvā prādravat kṛṣṇā sudeṣṇāyā niveśanam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.036c: keśān muktvā tu suśroṇī saṃrambhāl lohitekṣaṇā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.037a: śuśubhe vadanaṃ tasyā rudantyā virataṃ tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.037d-0338_007: yasyā hy arthe pāṇḍaveyās tyajeyur api jīvitam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.037d-0338_008: tāṃ te dṛṣṭvā tathā kṛṣṇāṃ kṣamiṇo dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.037d-0338_012: tām uvāca virāṭasya mahiṣī śāṭhyam āsthitā sudeṣṇovāca
GE07mbh_04_u:015.038-0339_004: nayanābhyām ajihmābhyāṃ mukhaṃ te muñcate jalam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.038a: kas tvāvadhīd varārohe kasmād rodiṣi śobhane
GE07mbh_04_u:015.038c: kasyādya na sukhaṃ bhadre kena te vipriyaṃ kṛtam vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.038d-0341_001: brūhi kiṃ te priyaṃ kurmi kaṃ tyaje ghātayāmi vā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.038d-0341_002: tāṃ niḥśvasyābravīt kṛṣṇā jānantī nāma pṛcchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:015.038d-0341_003: bhrātre tvaṃ mām anupreṣya kim evaṃ tvaṃ vikatthase
GE07mbh_04_u:015.039a: kīcako māvadhīt tatra surāhārīṃ gatāṃ tava
GE07mbh_04_u:015.039c: sabhāyāṃ paśyato rājño yathaiva vijane tathā sudeṣṇovāca
GE07mbh_04_u:015.040b-0342_001: bhrātā yady eṣa me vyaktaṃ yonito dharmacāriṇīm
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041a: anye vai taṃ vadhiṣyanti yeṣām āgaḥ karoti saḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041c: manye cādyaiva suvyaktaṃ paralokaṃ gamiṣyati janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0003: duḥśalāṃ mānayantī yā bhartṝṇāṃ bhaginīṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0006: nāśapat taṃ mahābhāgā kṛṣṇā pādena tāḍitā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0009: naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi śrotukāmo 'smi sattama
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0010: kṛṣṇāyās tu parikleśān mano me dūyate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0011: kasya vaṃśe samudbhūtaḥ sa ca durlalito mune
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0012: balonmattaḥ kathaṃ cāsīt syālo mātsyasya kīcakaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0013: dṛṣṭvāpi tāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ sūtaputreṇa tāḍitām vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0014: naiva cukṣubhire vīrāḥ kim akurvanta taṃ prati
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0016: etat sarvaṃ yathā vakṣye vistareṇeha pārthiva
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0017: brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāj jātaḥ sūto bhavati pārthiva
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0018: prātilomyena jātānāṃ sa hy eko dvija eva tu
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0020: kṣatriyād avaro vaiśyād viśiṣṭam iti cakṣate
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0021: saha sūtena saṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ narādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0022: tena tu prātilomyena rājaśabdo na labhyate
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0023: teṣāṃ tu sūtaviṣayaḥ sūtānāṃ nāmataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0024: upajīvyaṃ ca yat kṣatraṃ labdhaṃ sūtena yat purā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0025: sūtānām adhipo rājā kekayo nāma viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0027: putrās tasya kuruśreṣṭha mālavyāṃ jajñire tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0028: kīcakā iti vikhyātā śataṃ ṣaṭ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0029: teṣām āsīd balaśreṣṭhaḥ kīcakaḥ sarvajit prabho
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0031: mālavyā eva kauravya tatra hy avarajābhavat
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0033: tāṃ virāṭasya mātsyasya kekayaḥ pradadau mudā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0035: śvete vinaṣṭe śaṅkhe ca gate mātulaveśmani
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0036: sudeṣṇāṃ mahiṣīṃ labdhvā rājā duḥkham apānudat
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0040: sadā paricaran prītyā virāṭe nyavasat sukhī
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0041: bhrātaraś cāsya vikrāntāḥ sarve ca tam anuvratāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0042: virāṭasyaiva saṃhṛṣṭā balaṃ kośaṃ ca vardhayan
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0043: kāleyā nāma daiteyāḥ prāyaśo bhuvi viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0044: jajñire kīcakā rājan bāṇo jyeṣṭhas tato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0048: jigāya sarvāṃś ca ripūn yathendro dānavān purā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0049: mekhalāṃś ca trigartāṃś ca daśārṇāṃś ca kaśerukān
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0051: aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca taṅgaṇān parataṅgaṇān
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0052: karadāṃś ca niṣiddhāṃś ca śivān macchillikāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0054: kīcakena raṇe bhagnā vyadravanta diśo daśa
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0056: virāṭas tatra senāyāś cakāra patim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0059: evaṃvidhabalo bhīmaḥ kīcakās te ca tadvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0061: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ kīcakasya parākramam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0062: draupadī na śaśāpainaṃ yasmāt tad gadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0063: vikṣaranti tapaḥ krodhād ṛṣayo na śapanti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0064: jānantī tad yathātattvaṃ draupadī na śaśāpa tam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0065: kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0066: kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā śīlaṃ kṣamā kīrtiḥ kṣamā param
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0067: kṣamā puṇyaṃ kṣamā tīrthaṃ kṣamā sarvam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0068: kṣamāvatām ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś caiva kṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0069: etat sarvaṃ vijānantī sā kṣamām anvapadyata
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0071: nāśapat taṃ viśālākṣī satī śaktāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0072: pāṇḍavāś cāpi te sarve draupadīṃ prekṣya duḥkhitām
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0074: atha bhīmo mahābāhuḥ sūdayiṣyaṃs tu kīcakam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-019_0077: mahānase tadā kṛcchrāt suṣvāpa rajanīṃ ca tām
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0001: bhrātuḥ prayaccha tvaritā jīvaśrāddhaṃ tam adya vai
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0002: sudṛṣṭaṃ kuru caivenaṃ nāsūn manye dhariṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0003: teṣāṃ hi mama bhartṝṇāṃ pañcānāṃ dharmacāriṇām
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0005: nirmanuṣyam imaṃ lokaṃ kuryāt kruddho niśām imām
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0006: na ca saṃkrudhyate tāvad gandharvaḥ kāmarūpadhṛk
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0007: nūnaṃ jñāsyati yāvad vai mamaitat pādaghātanam
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0010: api caitat purā proktaṃ nipuṇair manujottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0011: ekas tu kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0012: nīco hy ātmāparādhena kulaṃ yena vinaśyati
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0013: sudeṣṇām evam uktvā tu sairandhrī duḥkhamohitā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0015: abhyarthitā ca nārībhir mānitā ca sudeṣṇayā
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0016: na ca snāti na cāśnāti pāṃsūn na parimārjati
GE07mbh_04_u:015.041d-018_0018: tāṃ tathā śokasaṃtaptāṃ dṛṣṭvā praruruduḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:016.002a: kṛtvā śaucaṃ yathānyāyaṃ kṛṣṇā vai tanumadhyamā
GE07mbh_04_u:016.002c: gātrāṇi vāsasī caiva prakṣālya salilena sā
GE07mbh_04_u:016.003a: cintayām āsa rudatī tasya duḥkhasya nirṇayam
GE07mbh_04_u:016.003c: kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi kathaṃ kāryaṃ bhaven mama
GE07mbh_04_u:016.004a: ity evaṃ cintayitvā sā bhīmaṃ vai manasāgamat
GE07mbh_04_u:016.004c: nānyaḥ kartā ṛte bhīmān mamādya manasaḥ priyam
GE07mbh_04_u:016.005a: tata utthāya rātrau sā vihāya śayanaṃ svakam
GE07mbh_04_u:016.005c: prādravan nātham icchantī kṛṣṇā nāthavatī satī
GE07mbh_04_u:016.006a: sā vai mahānase prāpya bhīmasenaṃ śucismitā
GE07mbh_04_u:016.007e: siṃhaṃ suptaṃ vane durge mṛgarājavadhūr iva
GE07mbh_04_u:016.007f-0347_001: parispṛśya ca pāṇibhyāṃ patiṃ suptam abodhayat
GE07mbh_04_u:016.007f-0347_002: śrīr ivānyā mahotsāhaṃ suptaṃ viṣṇum ivārṇave
GE07mbh_04_u:016.007f-0347_004: yathā śacī devarājaṃ rudrāṇī śaṃkaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:016.007f-0347_005: brahmāṇam iva sāvitrī yathā ṣaṣṭhī guhaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:016.007f-0347_007: bhīmaṃ prābodhayat kāntā lakṣmīr dāmodaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:016.009a: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kiṃ śeṣe bhīmasena yathā mṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:016.009c: nāmṛtasya hi pāpīyān bhāryām ālabhya jīvati
GE07mbh_04_u:016.010a: tasmiñ jīvati pāpiṣṭhe senāvāhe mama dviṣi
GE07mbh_04_u:016.010c: tat karma kṛtavaty adya kathaṃ nidrāṃ niṣevase vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:016.010d-0349_002: yasyāṃ bhīmas tadā śete mṛgarāja iva śvasan
GE07mbh_04_u:016.010d-0349_003: tasyā rūpeṇa sā śālā bhīmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:016.010d-0349_004: saṃmūrchiteva kauravya prajajvāla ca tejasā vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:016.010d-0350_001: sukhasuptaś ca taṃ śabdaṃ niśamya sa vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:016.013a: na te prakṛtimān varṇaḥ kṛśā pāṇḍuś ca lakṣyase
GE07mbh_04_u:016.013b-0352_001: prakāśaṃ yadi vā guhyaṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_04_u:016.013c: ācakṣva pariśeṣeṇa sarvaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:016.014a: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ dveṣyaṃ vā yadi vā priyam
GE07mbh_04_u:016.014c: yathāvat sarvam ācakṣva śrutvā jñāsyāmi yat param
GE07mbh_04_u:016.015a: aham eva hi te kṛṣṇe viśvāsyaḥ sarvakarmasu
GE07mbh_04_u:016.015c: aham āpatsu cāpi tvāṃ mokṣayāmi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:016.016a: śīghram uktvā yathākāmaṃ yat te kāryaṃ vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_04_u:016.016c: gaccha vai śayanāyaiva purā nānyo 'vabudhyate vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:016.016d-0353_001: sā lajjamānā bhītā ca adhomukhamukhī tataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:017.001a: aśocyaṃ nu kutas tasyā yasyā bhartā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:017.001c: jānan sarvāṇi duḥkhāni kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:017.002c: sabhāyāṃ pārṣado madhye tan māṃ dahati bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:017.002d-0354_003: kṣatriyais tatra karṇādyair dṛṣṭā duryodhanena ca
GE07mbh_04_u:017.002d-0354_004: śvaśurābhyāṃ ca bhīṣmeṇa vidureṇa ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_04_u:017.002d-0354_005: droṇena ca mahābāho kṛpeṇa ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_04_u:017.002d-0354_006: sāhaṃ śvaśurayor madhye bhartṛmadhye ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_04_u:017.002d-0354_007: keśe gṛhītvaiva sabhāṃ nītā jīvati vai tvayi
GE07mbh_04_u:017.002d-0355_001: vipramuktā tataś cāhaṃ nave rājyād vanaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_04_u:017.003a: pārthivasya sutā nāma kā nu jīveta mādṛśī
GE07mbh_04_u:017.003c: anubhūya bhṛśaṃ duḥkham anyatra draupadīṃ prabho
GE07mbh_04_u:017.004c: parāmarśaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca soḍhum utsahate nu kā
GE07mbh_04_u:017.004d-0356_006: gośīrṣakaṃ padmakaṃ ca hariśyāmaṃ ca candanam
GE07mbh_04_u:017.004d-0356_007: nityaṃ piṃṣe virāṭasya tvayi jīvati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_04_u:017.004d-0356_008: sāhaṃ bahūni duḥkhāni gaṇayāmi na te kṛte
GE07mbh_04_u:017.005a: matsyarājñaḥ samakṣaṃ ca tasya dhūrtasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:017.005c: kīcakena padā spṛṣṭā kā nu jīveta mādṛśī
GE07mbh_04_u:017.006a: evaṃ bahuvidhaiḥ kleśaiḥ kliśyamānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:017.006c: na māṃ jānāsi kaunteya kiṃ phalaṃ jīvitena me
GE07mbh_04_u:017.006d-0357_002: agnikuṇḍāt samudbhūtā norvyāṃ jātu carāmi bhoḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:017.006d-0357_003: kīcakaṃ cen na hanyās tvaṃ śilāṃ baddhvā jale mriye
GE07mbh_04_u:017.006d-0357_005: ātmānaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi vṛkṣam āruhya vā pate
GE07mbh_04_u:017.006d-0357_006: śastreṇāṅgaṃ ca bhetsyāmi kiṃ phalaṃ jīvitena me
GE07mbh_04_u:017.007a: yo 'yaṃ rājño virāṭasya kīcako nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:017.008c: nityam evāha duṣṭātmā bhāryā mama bhaveti vai
GE07mbh_04_u:017.009c: kāleneva phalaṃ pakvaṃ hṛdayaṃ me vidīryate
GE07mbh_04_u:017.009d-0358_001: śaraṇaṃ bhava kaunteya mā saṃgaccha yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_04_u:017.009d-0358_003: mā sma sīmantinī kā cij janayet putram īdṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:017.009d-0358_004: vijānāmi tavāmarṣaṃ balaṃ vīryaṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_04_u:017.009d-0358_007: bhūmau nipatitaṃ bilvaṃ padbhyām ākramya pīḍayet
GE07mbh_04_u:017.009d-0358_008: tathaiva ca śiras tasya nipātya dharaṇītale
GE07mbh_04_u:017.009d-0358_010: sa ced udyantam ādityaṃ prātar utthāya paśyati

GE07mbh_04_u:024.001-0495_001: kīcake tu hate rājā virāṭaḥ paravīrahā

GE07mbh_04_u:024.013a: narendra bahuśo 'nviṣṭā naiva vidmaś ca pāṇḍavān

GE07mbh_04_u:027.016a: rasavanti ca dhānyāni guṇavanti phalāni ca
