GE07mbh_04_u:027.017a: vāyuś ca sukhasaṃsparśo niṣpratīpaṃ ca darśanam
GE07mbh_04_u:027.017b-0537_001: na rogās tatra vidyante vadhabandhā na santi ca
GE07mbh_04_u:027.017b-0537_002: na corā na hi dambhāś ca na ca bādhā bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:027.017b-0537_003: nāśaktā na ca duṣṭāś ca yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.017c: bhayaṃ nābhyāviśet tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.018a: gāvaś ca bahulās tatra na kṛśā na ca durduhāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.018d-0538_001: salilāni prasannāni sarve bhāvāś ca śobhanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.019a: guṇavanti ca pānāni bhojyāni rasavanti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:027.019c: tatra deśe bhaviṣyanti yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.020a: rasāḥ sparśāś ca gandhāś ca śabdāś cāpi guṇānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.020c: dṛśyāni ca prasannāni yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.020d-0539_001: dharmāś ca tatra dṛśyante sevitāś ca dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.021a: svaiḥ svair guṇaiḥ susaṃyuktās tasmin varṣe trayodaśe
GE07mbh_04_u:027.022a: saṃprītimāñ janas tatra saṃtuṣṭaḥ śucir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.023e: bhaviṣyati janas tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.024d-0542_001: anirdiśyaḥ sa dharmātmā dvijair api hi bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:027.025a: dharmātmā sa tadādṛśyaḥ so 'pi tāta dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.025c: kiṃ punaḥ prākṛtaiḥ pārthaḥ śakyo vijñātum antataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.026a: yasmin satyaṃ dhṛtir dānaṃ parā śāntir dhruvā kṣamā
GE07mbh_04_u:027.026c: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ paraṃ teja ānṛśaṃsyam athārjavam
GE07mbh_04_u:027.027a: tasmāt tatra nivāsaṃ tu channaṃ satreṇa dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:027.027c: gatiṃ vā paramāṃ tasya notsahe vaktum anyathā
GE07mbh_04_u:027.028a: evam etat tu saṃcintya yatkṛtaṃ manyase hitam
GE07mbh_04_u:027.028c: tat kṣipraṃ kuru kauravya yady evaṃ śraddadhāsi me
GE07mbh_04_u:027.028d-0543_001: kulasya hi kṣamaṃ tāta yad ahaṃ tad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_04_u:028.001a: tataḥ śāradvato vākyam ity uvāca kṛpas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:028.001c: yuktaṃ prāptaṃ ca vṛddhena pāṇḍavān prati bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_04_u:028.002c: tatrānurūpaṃ bhīṣmeṇa mamāpy atra giraṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_04_u:028.003a: teṣāṃ caiva gatis tīrthair vāsaś caiṣāṃ pracintyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:028.003c: nītir vidhīyatāṃ cāpi sāṃprataṃ yā hitā bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:028.004c: kiṃ punaḥ pāṇḍavās tāta sarvāstrakuśalā raṇe
GE07mbh_04_u:028.006c: udaye pāṇḍavānāṃ ca prāpte kāle na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.008a: tasmād balaṃ ca kośaṃ ca nītiś cāpi vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:028.008c: yathā kālodaye prāpte samyak taiḥ saṃdadhāmahe
GE07mbh_04_u:028.009a: tāta manyāmi tat sarvaṃ budhyasva balam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.010a: uccāvacaṃ balaṃ jñātvā madhyasthaṃ cāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:028.010c: prahṛṣṭam aprahṛṣṭaṃ ca saṃdadhāma tathā paraiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.011c: nyāyenānamya ca parān balāc cānamya durbalān
GE07mbh_04_u:028.012a: sāntvayitvā ca mitrāṇi balaṃ cābhāṣyatāṃ sukham
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014c: yathākālaṃ manuṣyendra ciraṃ sukham avāpsyasi vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0001: tato duryodhano vākyaṃ śrutvā teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0002: muhūrtam iva saṃcintya sacivān idam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0003: śrutaṃ hy etan mayā pūrvaṃ kathāsu janasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0008: catvāras tu naravyāghrā bale śakropamā bhuvi
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0009: uttamāḥ prāṇināṃ teṣāṃ nāsti kaś cid bale samaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0011: baladevaś ca bhīmaś ca madrarājaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0016: manasy abhiniviṣṭaṃ me vyaktaṃ jīvanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0018: sairandhrīṃ draupadīṃ manye nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0021: ko hi śakto 'paro bhīmāt kīcakaṃ hantum ojasā
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0027: pitāmahena ye coktā deśasya ca janasya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0028: guṇās te matsyarāṣṭreṣu bahuśo 'pi mayā śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0030: nivasanti pure ramye tatra yātrā vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0032: gṛhīte godhane nūnaṃ te 'pi yotsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0033: apūrṇe samaye cāpi yadi paśyāma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0038: etac cāpi vadaty eṣa mātsyaḥ paribhavān mayi
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0039: tasmāt kartavyam etad vai tasmin yātrā vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:028.014d-027_0040: etat sunītaṃ manye 'haṃ sarveṣāṃ yadi rocate
GE07mbh_04_u:029.001b-0545_001: pūrvam ābhāṣya karṇena tathā duḥśāsanena ca
GE07mbh_04_u:029.001c: prāptakālam idaṃ vākyam uvāca tvarito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:029.002a: asakṛn nikṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ matsyaiḥ sālveyakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:029.002c: sūtena caiva matsyasya kīcakena punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.003a: bādhito bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ balād balavatā vibho
GE07mbh_04_u:029.004a: asakṛn matsyarājñā me rāṣṭraṃ bādhitam ojasā
GE07mbh_04_u:029.004c: praṇetā kīcakaś cāsya balavān abhavat purā
GE07mbh_04_u:029.006a: tasmiṃś ca nihate rājan hīnadarpo nirāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.006c: bhaviṣyati nirutsāho virāṭa iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.007a: tatra yātrā mama matā yadi te rocate 'nagha
GE07mbh_04_u:029.007c: kauravāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.008a: etat prāptam ahaṃ manye kāryam ātyayikaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_04_u:029.009c: grāmān rāṣṭrāṇi vā tasya hariṣyāmo vibhāgaśaḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:029.010b-0546_001: vidhamitvā hariṣyāmaḥ praviśya ca purād balam
GE07mbh_04_u:029.011a: kauravaiḥ saha saṃgamya trigartaiś ca viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_04_u:029.012c: hatvā cāsya camūṃ kṛtsnāṃ vaśam anvānayāmahe

GE07mbh_04_u:029.013c: bhavato balavṛddhiś ca bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.014a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya karṇo rājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:029.014c: sūktaṃ suśarmaṇā vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ ca naḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.015b-0547_001: yady etat te 'bhirucitaṃ mama caitad dhi rocate
GE07mbh_04_u:029.015c: vibhajya cāpy anīkāni yathā vā manyase 'nagha
GE07mbh_04_u:029.016c: ācāryaś ca tathā droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:029.017a: manyante te yathā sarve tathā yātrā vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:029.018a: kiṃ ca naḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kāryaṃ hīnārthabalapauruṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.018c: atyarthaṃ vā pranaṣṭās te prāptā vāpi yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_04_u:029.018d-0548_001: tad bhavāṃś caturaṅgeṇa balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019c: ādāsyāmo hi gās tasya vividhāni vasūni ca duryodhana uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0001: uktam etad vidheyaṃ vā vākyam uktaṃ tvayānagha
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0004: tadaiva hi mahācintā hṛdi pāṇḍusutān prati
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0006: nityam eva hi pārthānāṃ virāṭaḥ priyam icchati
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0007: tasmiṃs te cāpi viśvastā nivāsāya sthitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0009: tad dhi rājño virāṭasya śrūyate viṣaye kila
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0010: tat tatra gatvā karṇāśu virāṭaṃ godhanaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0011: gṛhṇīmas tasya rāṣṭraṃ ca pramathya svabalair yutāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0013: tatra vetsyāmahe tān vai buddhvā caiṣāṃ yathāgatim
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0015: hatvāpi caitāṃs tatraiva sukhaṃ bhokṣyāma medinīm
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0016: alpāvaśiṣṭaḥ kālo 'yaṃ samayaś ca vibhāti me
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0017: udyojayāma sainyāni śvobhūte gamanaṃ prati karṇa uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0018: yadi tatra sma te pārthā bhaveyū rājasattama

GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0021: dīnās te kośahīnāś ca vanavāsena karśitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.019d-028_0022: sukhena hantum arhanti atha pravrājanāya vai
GE07mbh_04_u:029.020a: tato duryodhano rājā vākyam ādāya tasya tat

GE07mbh_04_u:029.022c: suśarmā tu yathoddiṣṭaṃ deśaṃ yātu mahārathaḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:029.024d-0549_002: virāṭaḥ sainyam ādāya trigartaiḥ saha yotsyate
GE07mbh_04_u:029.024d-0549_003: aparaṃ divasaṃ gās tu tatra gṛhṇantu kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.024d-0549_004: gavārthe pāṇḍavās tatra yotsyanti kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:029.025a: te yātvā sahasā tatra virāṭanagaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_04_u:029.025c: kṣipraṃ gopān samāsādya gṛhṇantu vipulaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:029.026c: vayam api nigṛhṇīmo dvidhā kṛtvā varūthinīm
GE07mbh_04_u:029.027a: sa sma gatvā yathoddiṣṭāṃ diśaṃ vahner mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:029.028a: aparaṃ divasaṃ sarve rājan saṃbhūya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.002a: vyatītaḥ samayaḥ samyag vasatāṃ vai purottame
GE07mbh_04_u:030.002d-0553_001: kīcake tu hate rājā virāṭaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_04_u:030.002d-0553_002: āsāṃ cakre sahāmātyaḥ kuntīputraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003c: suśarmaṇā gṛhītaṃ tu godhanaṃ tarasā bahu
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0001: tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīd reṇuś ca divam aspṛśat
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0004: evaṃ tais tv abhiniryāya matsyarājasya godhane
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0006: atha trigartā bahavaḥ parigṛhya dhanaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0007: parikṣipya hayaiḥ śīghrai rathavrātaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0008: gopālān pratyayudhyanta raṇe kṛtvā jaye dhṛtim
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0010: gopālā gokule bhaktā vārayām āsur ojasā
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0011: paraśvadhaiś ca musalair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca mudgaraiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.003d-029_0012: gopālāḥ karpaṇaiś citrair jaghnur aśvān samantataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.004a: tato javena mahatā gopāḥ puram athāvrajat
GE07mbh_04_u:030.004c: apaśyan matsyarājaṃ ca rathāt praskandya kuṇḍalī
GE07mbh_04_u:030.005c: sadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ pāṇḍavaiś ca nararṣabhaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.007e: tān parīpsa manuṣyendra mā neśuḥ paśavas tava vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.007f-0555_001: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ gopālānām ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.008a: tac chrutvā nṛpatiḥ senāṃ matsyānāṃ samayojayat
GE07mbh_04_u:030.009a: rājāno rājaputrāś ca tanutrāṇy atra bhejire
GE07mbh_04_u:030.009d-0557_002: utkṛṣya pāśān maurvīṇāṃ vīrāś cāpeṣv ayojayan
GE07mbh_04_u:030.013a: utsedhe yasya padmāni śataṃ saugandhikāni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:030.014a: dṛḍham āyasagarbhaṃ tu śvetaṃ varma śatākṣimat
GE07mbh_04_u:030.018d-0559_003: daṃśito ratham āsthāya padaṃ niryāmy ahaṃ gavām
GE07mbh_04_u:030.018d-0559_004: ayaṃ ca balavāñ chūro valalo dṛśyate 'nagha
GE07mbh_04_u:030.018d-0559_006: naite na jātu yudhyeyur gavārtham iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.019d-0560_001: tantipālaś ca gosaṃkhyo ya etat puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.019e: yudhyeyur iti me buddhir vartate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.020c: kavacāni vicitrāṇi dṛḍhāni ca mṛdūni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:030.021c: neme jātu na yudhyerann iti me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.022a: etac chrutvā tu nṛpater vākyaṃ tvaritamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.022c: śatānīkas tu pārthebhyo rathān rājan samādiśat
GE07mbh_04_u:030.022e: sahadevāya rājñe ca bhīmāya nakulāya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:030.024a: kavacāni vicitrāṇi dṛḍhāni ca mṛdūni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:030.024e: tāny āmucya śarīreṣu daṃśitās te paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.024f-0562_001: rathān hayaiḥ susaṃpannān āsthāya ca narottamāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.025f-0565_001: dīrghāṇāṃ ca dṛḍhānāṃ ca dhanuṣāṃ te yathābalam
GE07mbh_04_u:030.025f-0565_002: utkṛṣya pāśān maurvīṇāṃ vīrāś cāpeṣv ayojayan
GE07mbh_04_u:030.025f-0565_003: tataḥ suvāsasaḥ sarve te vīrāś candanokṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.027c: rājānam anvayuḥ paścāc calanta iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:030.028f-0567_001: pūrṇe śatasahasre dve padātīnāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:031.001c: trigartān aspṛśan matsyāḥ sūrye pariṇate sati
GE07mbh_04_u:031.001d-0569a_001: trigartā aspṛśan mātsyān pūrvam eva mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.002a: te trigartāś ca matsyāś ca saṃrabdhā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.004c: devāsurasamo rājann āsīt sūrye vilambati padātirathanāgendrahayārohabalaughavān
GE07mbh_04_u:031.005a: udatiṣṭhad rajo bhaumaṃ na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:031.008a: rathā rathaiḥ samājagmuḥ pādātaiś ca padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.008c: sādibhiḥ sādinaś caiva gajaiś cāpi mahāgajāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.009a: asibhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ prāsaiḥ śaktibhis tomarair api
GE07mbh_04_u:031.009d-0574_001: antarikṣe gatir yeṣāṃ dadṛśuś cāpi vadhyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:031.010c: na śekur abhisaṃrabdhāḥ śūrān kartuṃ parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_04_u:031.012a: adṛśyaṃs tatra gātrāṇi śaraiś chinnāni bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.013c: ākīrṇā vasudhā tatra śirobhiś ca sakuṇḍalaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.013d-0576_002: bibhratī yuvatī śyāmā bhāti tadvad vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_04_u:031.014d-0577_002: antarikṣe gatir yeṣāṃ darśanaṃ cāpy arudhyata
GE07mbh_04_u:031.014d-0579_003: ātmānaṃ śyenavat kṛtvā tuṇḍam āsīd yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.014d-0579_004: pakṣau yamau ca bhavataḥ puccham āsīd vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.016c: jagmatuḥ sūryadattaś ca madirāśvaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.017a: virāṭas tatra saṃgrāme hatvā pañcaśatān rathān
GE07mbh_04_u:031.017c: hayānāṃ ca śatāny atra hatvā pañca mahārathān
GE07mbh_04_u:031.018a: caran sa vividhān mārgān ratheṣu rathayūthapaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.019d-0583_001: trigartānāṃ ca mukhyo 'sau matsyānāṃ ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:031.019d-030_0003: hanyatāṃ hanyatām eva śirāṃsi patitāny api
GE07mbh_04_u:031.019d-030_0005: virāṭaś ca mahāścaryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kautukam āgatam

GE07mbh_04_u:034.011d-0623_001: śrutvā tad arjuno vākyam uttareṇa prabhāṣitam

GE07mbh_04_u:034.016a: yeyaṃ kumārī suśroṇī bhaginī te yavīyasī

GE07mbh_04_u:035.013d-0635_002: suhotro jāmadagnyasya viṣṇor yantā ca dārukaḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:036.040c: mattāṃś ca daśa mātaṅgān muñca māṃ tvaṃ bṛhannaḍe
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-0675_001: ṣaṣṭiṃ svalaṃkṛtāḥ kanyā grāmam ekaṃ dadāmi te
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-0675_002: muñca māṃ tvaṃ bhṛśaṃ dīnaṃ vihvalaṃ bhayakampitam
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-0675_003: gamiṣyāmi puraṃ ṣaṇḍha draṣṭuṃ mātaram arditām

GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-0676_004: mātṛpārśvaṃ gamiṣyāmi muñca māṃ tvaṃ bṛhannale
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-0676_007: uktavān madagarveṇa ko jetuṃ śaknuyāt kurūn
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-0676_008: amuktvā vā yadi nayer mariṣyāmi tavāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-035_0001: pragṛhyaitad dhanaṃ sarvaṃ muñca māṃ tvaṃ bṛhannaḍe
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-035_0002: āranālena jīviṣye na me gobhiḥ prayojanam arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:036.040d-035_0003: jīvan prāpsyāmi gā hy anyā nivartasva
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042a: athainam abravīt pārtho bhayārtaṃ naṣṭacetasam arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_001: ahaṃ yotsyāmi kauravyair hayān saṃyaccha cottara
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_003: yudhyasva kauravaiḥ sārdhaṃ vijayas te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_004: yasya yantāsmy ahaṃ yuddhe saṃyacchāmi hayottamān
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_005: rājño vā rājaputrasya tasya nityaṃ jayo dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_006: sarvathottara yudhyasva yantrā sākaṃ mayā kurūn
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_007: jitvā mahīṃ yaśaḥ prāpya bhokṣyase sakalām imām
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_008: hato 'pi prāpsyase svargaṃ na śreyas te palāyanam
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_009: adya sarvān kurūñ jitvā yathā jayam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0677_010: tathāhaṃ prayatiṣye 'tra sahāyo 'tra mato hy aham
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042b-0678_001: saṃyacchāmi hayān yasya na sa bhītaḥ palāyati
GE07mbh_04_u:036.042e: ehi me tvaṃ hayān yaccha yudhyamānasya śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:036.044a: mā bhais tvaṃ rājaputrāgrya kṣatriyo 'si paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_04_u:036.044c: ahaṃ vai kurubhir yotsyāmy avajeṣyāmi te paśūn
GE07mbh_04_u:036.045c: yantā bhūs tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha yotsye 'haṃ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:036.047c: ratham āropayām āsa pārthaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:036.047d-0681_002: yathendro dānavān hantuṃ prayāti ca samātaliḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:036.047d-0682_002: gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur ādātum upāyāt tāṃ śamīṃ prati
GE07mbh_04_u:036.047d-0682_003: uttaraṃ sa samāśvāsya kṛtvā yantāram arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.001c: śamīm abhimukhaṃ yāntaṃ ratham āropya cottaram
GE07mbh_04_u:037.003a: tān avekṣya hatotsāhān utpātān api cādbhutān
GE07mbh_04_u:037.004a: calāś ca vātāḥ saṃvānti rūkṣāḥ paruṣaniḥsvanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.005c: niḥsaranti ca kośebhyaḥ śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:037.006a: śivāś ca vinadanty etā dīptāyāṃ diśi dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.006c: hayāś cāśrūṇi muñcanti dhvajāḥ kampanty akampitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.007a: yādṛśāny atra rūpāṇi saṃdṛśyante bahūny api
GE07mbh_04_u:037.007c: yattā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu syād yuddhaṃ samupasthitam
GE07mbh_04_u:037.008a: rakṣadhvam api cātmānaṃ vyūhadhvaṃ vāhinīm api
GE07mbh_04_u:037.008c: vaiśasaṃ ca pratīkṣadhvaṃ rakṣadhvaṃ cāpi godhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:037.008d-0683_001: etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ bhīṣmam ālokya cābravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:037.008d-0683_006: ity uktvā saṃjñayā droṇas tūṣṇīm āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:037.008d-0683_009: atītaḥ samayaś cokto hy asmābhir yaḥ sabhātale
GE07mbh_04_u:037.008d-0683_010: na bhayaṃ śatrutaḥ kāryaṃ śaṅkāṃ tyaja nararṣabha
GE07mbh_04_u:037.009b-0685_001: gavām arthe hi vikrāntaḥ savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.009b-0686_004: jitvāva yaṃ neṣyati cādya gā vaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.009c: āgataḥ klībaveṣeṇa pārtho nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010a: sa eṣa pārtho vikrāntaḥ savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0001: ye jetāro mahīpānām amunā bahavo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0002: yasmiṃs tejo mahat kṛtsnaṃ nirbharocchvasitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0003: yena me dakṣiṇā dattā baddhvā drupadam ojasā
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0004: viddhvā viyadgataṃ lakṣyaṃ vinirjitya ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0006: khāṇḍave yena saṃtṛpto vahnir jitvā surāsurān
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0007: pariṇītā subhadrā ca yena nirjitya yādavān
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0009: gatvā triviṣṭapaṃ yena jitendrā dānavā yudhi
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0012: yena tvaṃ mocito baddhaś citrasenena tadvane
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0013: yena gatvottaraṃ meror ānināya mahad dhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0014: yājito dharmasūnuś ca nṛpān sarvān vijitya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0015: yasmiñ śauryaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca tejo dhairyaṃ parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.010d-036_0016: audāryaṃ caiva gāmbhīryaṃ hrīḥ śrīr dharmo dayārjavam
GE07mbh_04_u:037.011a: kleśitaś ca vane śūro vāsavena ca śikṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.012d-0688_001: ity evaṃ vādinaṃ droṇaṃ karṇaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.013a: sadā bhavān phalgunasya guṇair asmān vikatthase
GE07mbh_04_u:037.013c: na cārjunaḥ kalā pūrṇā mama duryodhanasya vā
GE07mbh_04_u:037.014a: yady eṣa pārtho rādheya kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bhaven mama
GE07mbh_04_u:037.014c: jñātāḥ punaś cariṣyanti dvādaśānyān hi vatsarān
GE07mbh_04_u:037.015a: athaiṣa kaś cid evānyaḥ klībaveṣeṇa mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:037.016a: tasmin bruvati tad vākyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭre paraṃtape
GE07mbh_04_u:037.016c: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpo drauṇiḥ pauruṣaṃ tad apūjayan
GE07mbh_04_u:038.001a: tāṃ śamīm upasaṃgamya pārtho vairāṭim abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:038.002c: nemāni hi tvadīyāni soḍhuṃ śakṣyanti me balam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.003a: bhāraṃ vāpi guruṃ hartuṃ kuñjaraṃ vā pramarditum
GE07mbh_04_u:038.003c: mama vā bāhuvikṣepaṃ śatrūn iha vijeṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.003d-0690_001: naibhiḥ kāmam ahaṃ kartuṃ karma vaijayikaṃ tv iha
GE07mbh_04_u:038.003d-0690_002: atisūkṣmāṇi hrasvāni sarvāṇi ca mṛdūni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.004c: asyāṃ hi pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ dhanūṃṣi nihitāny uta
GE07mbh_04_u:038.005c: dhvajāḥ śarāś ca śūrāṇāṃ divyāni kavacāni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.006a: atra caitan mahāvīryaṃ dhanuḥ pārthasya gāṇḍivam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.008c: alaṃ bhāraṃ guruṃ voḍhuṃ dāruṇaṃ cārudarśanam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.008e: tādṛśāny eva sarvāṇi balavanti dṛḍhāni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.009a: asmin vṛkṣe kilodbaddhaṃ śarīram iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.009c: tad ahaṃ rājaputraḥ san spṛśeyaṃ pāṇinā katham
GE07mbh_04_u:038.010d-0693_001: spṛśāmīha śarīraṃ ced apy asyāṃ śokavarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.011c: kathaṃ vā vyavahāryaṃ vai kurvīthās tvaṃ bṛhannaḍe vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.011d-0694_001: tam uvāca tataḥ śūraḥ pārthaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.011d-0694_003: jānāmi tvāṃ mahāprājña śubhaṃ jātyā kulena ca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.011d-0694_004: kathaṃ nu pāpakaṃ karma brūyāṃ tvāhaṃ paraṃtapa bṛhannaḍovāca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.012a: vyavahāryaś ca rājendra śuciś caiva bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_04_u:038.012c: dhanūṃṣy etāni mā bhais tvaṃ śarīraṃ nātra vidyate
GE07mbh_04_u:038.013c: kathaṃ tvā ninditaṃ karma kārayeyaṃ nṛpātmaja
GE07mbh_04_u:038.014a: evam uktaḥ sa pārthena rathāt praskandya kuṇḍalī
GE07mbh_04_u:038.015a: tam anvaśāsac chatrughno rathe tiṣṭhan dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.015b-0695_001: avāropaya vṛkṣāgrād dhanūṃṣy etāni mā bibhaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.016c: apaśyad gāṇḍivaṃ tatra caturbhir aparaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:038.017c: viniśceruḥ prabhā divyā grahāṇām udayeṣv iva
GE07mbh_04_u:038.018a: sa teṣāṃ rūpam ālokya bhoginām iva jṛmbhatām
GE07mbh_04_u:038.018c-0698_003: āmīlya punar unmīlya spṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.018d-0699_001: tad upaśrutya śatrughnaḥ sa tadārjunam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:038.018d-0699_002: sārathe kim idaṃ śete nāgendro vāpi vā dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.019a: saṃspṛśya tāni cāpāni bhānumanti bṛhanti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.019c: vairāṭir arjunaṃ rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt uttara uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.020-0700_001: na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ citraṃ dhanuṣo rūpam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.021a: vāraṇā yasya sauvarṇāḥ pṛṣṭhe bhāsanti daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.022c: pṛṣṭhe vibhaktāḥ śobhante kasyaitad dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.023a: sūryā yatra ca sauvarṇās trayo bhāsanti daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.023c: tejasā prajvalanto hi kasyaitad dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.025a: ime ca kasya nārācāḥ sahasrā lomavāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.032a: kasyāyaṃ vimalaḥ khaḍgo gavye kośe samarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_001: sārathe kim idaṃ divyaṃ nāgo vā yadi vā dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_009: (21ab) ṛṣabhā yasya sauvarṇāḥ pṛṣṭhe tiṣṭhanti śṛṅgiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_013: kasyedam īdṛśaṃ citraṃ dhanuḥ sarve ca daṃsitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_019: matsyā yasya hiraṇyasya pṛṣṭhe tiṣṭhanti saṃcitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_031: (30a) kasyāyaṃ sāyako dīrgho gavye kośe ca daṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_032: kasya daṇḍo dṛḍhaḥ ślakṣṇo ruciro 'yaṃ prakāśate
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_038: ṛṣabhājinakośas tu kasya khaḍgo mahān ayam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_042: (33c) pramāṇavarṇayuktaś ca kasya khaḍgo mahān ayam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.034d-0704_043: naitena pratividdhaḥ sañ jīvet kaś cana kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.035c: vismayo me paro jāto dṛṣṭvā sarvam idaṃ mahat bṛhannaḍovāca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.036-0708_001: uttareṇaivam uktas tu pārtho vairāṭim abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:038.036-0708_002: mṛdvyā pratyāyayan vācā bhītaṃ śaṅkāvaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.036c: gāṇḍīvam etat pārthasya lokeṣu viditaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.036d-0709_001: abhedyam ajaraṃ śrīmad divyam acchedyam avraṇam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.038c: yena devān manuṣyāṃś ca pārtho viṣahate mṛdhe
GE07mbh_04_u:038.038d-0710_001: citram uccāvacair varṇaiḥ ślakṣṇam āyatam avraṇam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.039c: etad varṣasahasraṃ tu brahmā pūrvam adhārayat
GE07mbh_04_u:038.040c: trīṇi pañcaśataṃ caiva śakro 'śīti ca pañca ca
GE07mbh_04_u:038.041a: somaḥ pañcaśataṃ rājā tathaiva varuṇaḥ śatam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.041b-0711_001: tasmāc ca varuṇād agniḥ premṇā prāhṛtya tac chubham
GE07mbh_04_u:038.041c: pārthaḥ pañca ca ṣaṣṭiṃ ca varṣāṇi śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.042a: mahāvīryaṃ mahad divyam etat tad dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_04_u:038.042b-0713_002: bindavaś cāsya sauvarṇāḥ pṛṣṭhe sādhu niyojitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.043b-0715_002: ṛṣabhāś cāpi sauvarṇāḥ pṛṣṭhe tiṣṭhanti śṛṅgiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.043c: yena pārtho 'jayat kṛtsnāṃ diśaṃ prācīṃ paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.045a: sūryā yasmiṃs tu sauvarṇāḥ prabhāsante prabhāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.047a: ye tv ime kṣurasaṃkāśāḥ sahasrā lomavāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.048d-0718_001: ghorāgrā dīrgharūpāś ca girīṇām api dāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.050a: hāridravarṇā ye tv ete hemapuṅkhāḥ śilāśitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.051a: yenāsau vyajayat kṛtsnāṃ pratīcīṃ diśam āhave
GE07mbh_04_u:038.051c: kalāpo hy eṣa tasyāsīn mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.052a: ye tv ime bhāskarākārāḥ sarvapāraśavāḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.053a: ye tv ime niśitāḥ pītāḥ pṛthavo dīrghavāsasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.054a: yas tv ayaṃ sāyako dīrghaḥ śilīpṛṣṭhaḥ śilīmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.057a: yas tu pāñcanakhe kośe nihitaś citrasevane
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058a: yas tv ayaṃ vimalaḥ khaḍgo gavye kośe samarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058c: sahadevasya viddhy enaṃ sarvabhārasahaṃ dṛḍham vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_002: nakulasya dhanus tv etan mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_003: etena sadṛśaṃ citraṃ dhanuś caitad yavīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_007: bhīmena prahitā hy ete vāraṇānāṃ nivāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_010: yāṃś ca tvaṃ pṛcchase dīrghān samadhārān samāhitān
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_012: (54a) yas tv ayaṃ sāyako divyo gavye kośe ca daṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_014: yas tv ayaṃ nirmalaḥ khaḍgo dvīpicarmaṇi daṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_022: (57a) yas tv ayaṃ pārṣate kośe prakṣipto ruciratsaruḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_024: (58a) yas tv ayaṃ piṅgalaḥ khaḍgaś citro maṇimayatsaruḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0720_027: bhedato hy arjunas tūrṇaṃ kathayām āsa tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0721_001: anyat tu sahadevasya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:038.058d-0722_003: ity uttaraṃ tu tat sarvam arjunas tattvato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:039.001d-0723_001: etasminn antare pārthaṃ mūḍhātmā na vyajānata
GE07mbh_04_u:039.001d-0723_002: virāṭaputraḥ pramukhe papraccha punar eva tu
GE07mbh_04_u:039.002a: kva nu svid arjunaḥ pārthaḥ kauravyo vā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:039.002c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:039.002d-0724_001: kva nu te pāṇḍavāḥ śūrāḥ saṃgrāmeṣv aparājitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:039.002d-0724_002: eṣām imāni divyāni śriyā dīvyanti bhānti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:039.002d-0724_003: kasmin vasanti te deśe dharmajñā bandhuvatsalāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:039.002d-0724_005: bhīmasenārjunau cāpi sarve te mātulā mama
GE07mbh_04_u:039.002d-0725_001: dharmaśīlaś ca dharmātmā dharmavān dharmavit sudhīḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:039.003c: rājyam akṣaiḥ parākīrya na śrūyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_04_u:039.004a: draupadī kva ca pāñcālī strīratnam iti viśrutā
GE07mbh_04_u:039.004c: jitān akṣais tadā kṛṣṇā tān evānvagamad vanam
GE07mbh_04_u:039.004d-0726_001: utsṛjya dharmarājyaṃ te na śrūyante vanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:039.004d-0726_002: pāṇḍavān yadi jānīṣe kva nu te dharmacāriṇaḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:041.016a: vyākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā hṛdayaṃ vyathatīva me

GE07mbh_04_u:041.016e: gāṇḍīvasya ca śabdena karṇau me badhirīkṛtau
GE07mbh_04_u:041.016f-0779_001: sa muhūrtaṃ prayātaṃ tu pārtho vairāṭim abravīt vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.016f-0780_001: punar dhvajaṃ punaḥ śaṅkhaṃ dhanuś caiva punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.016f-0780_003: sthiro bhava mahābāho saṃjñāṃ cātmānam ānaya
GE07mbh_04_u:041.017a: ekānte ratham āsthāya padbhyāṃ tvam avapīḍaya
GE07mbh_04_u:041.017c: dṛḍhaṃ ca raśmīn saṃyaccha śaṅkhaṃ dhmāsyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.017d-0781_001: na bhayaṃ vidyate cānyan mayi tiṣṭhati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_04_u:041.017d-0781_002: paśya bāhubalaṃ vīra yudhyataḥ śatrubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:041.017d-0782_001: sthirīkuruṣva hṛdayaṃ yathā śabdo mahān bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:041.017d-0783_003: jyāghoṣaṃ talaghoṣaṃ ca kṛtvā bhūtāny amohayat vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018-0784_001: tataḥ sa punar evātha taṃ śaṅkhaṃ prādhamad balī
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018-0785_001: tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāsīd dārayann iva parvatān
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018-0785_002: guhā girīṇāṃ ca tadā diśaḥ śailāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018d-0787_001: śrutvā śabdaṃ tadā droṇo gāṅgeyaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018d-0788_001: uttaraṃ tu rathe dṛṣṭvā śaṅkhaśabdena mohitam
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018d-0789_001: sa rathaḥ saṃsmṛtas tena upāyād vānaradhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018d-0790_001: taṃ samāśvāsayām āsa punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018d-0791_002: uvāca ha kuror madhye sarvaṃ saṃbodhayann iva vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018d-0792_001: śaṅkhaśabdaṃ ca taṃ śrutvā meghasya ninadaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:041.018d-0793_002: rājānaṃ cāha saṃprekṣya duryodhanam ariṃdamam droṇa uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:041.019a: yathā rathasya nirghoṣo yathā śaṅkha udīryate
GE07mbh_04_u:041.019c: kampate ca yathā bhūmir naiṣo 'nyaḥ savyasācinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.019d-0797_001: autpātikam idaṃ rājan nimittaṃ bhavatīha naḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.019d-0797_002: na hi paśyāmi vijayaṃ sainye 'smākaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_04_u:041.020a: śastrāṇi na prakāśante na prahṛṣyanti vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.020c: agnayaś ca na bhāsante samiddhās tan na śobhanam

GE07mbh_04_u:041.021c: dhvajeṣu ca nilīyante vāyasās tan na śobhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:041.021e: śakunāś cāpasavyā no vedayanti mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022c: anāhataś ca niṣkrānto mahad vedayate bhayam
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022f-0798_005: ulkābhiś ca pradīptābhir bādhyate pṛtanā tava
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022f-0798_007: upāsate ca sainyāni gṛdhrās tava samantataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022f-0799_001: anuṣṇāṅgāś ca saṃsvinnā jṛmbhante cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022f-0799_003: sadā mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca utsṛjante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022f-0799_004: lohitārdrā ca pṛthivī diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradhūpitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022f-0799_005: na ca sūryaḥ pratapati mahad vedayate bhayam
GE07mbh_04_u:041.022f-0799_006: hastinaś cāpi vitrastā yodhāś cāpi vitatrasuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023a: parābhūtā ca vaḥ senā na kaś cid yoddhum icchati
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023d-0800_001: diśaṃ te dakṣiṇāṃ sarve viprekṣante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023d-0800_002: mṛgāś ca pakṣiṇaś caiva savyam eva patanti naḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023d-0800_003: vāditroddhuṣṭaghoṣāś ca na gāḍhaṃ prasvananti naḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023d-0800_004: yathā meghasya ninado gambhīras tūrṇam āyataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023d-0800_007: vānaraś ca dhvajo nityo niḥsaṅgaṃ dhūyate mahān
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023d-0800_009: sarvasainyaṃ ca vitrastaṃ nāyam anyo dhanaṃjayāt
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023f-0801_001: pravibhajya tridhā senāṃ samucchritya dhvajān api
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023f-0802_001: śitair bāṇaiḥ pratapyemāṃ camūm eṣa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:041.023f-0802_003: na hy eṣa śakyo bībhatsur jetuṃ devāsurair api
GE07mbh_04_u:042.001a: atha duryodhano rājā samare bhīṣmam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:042.001c: droṇaṃ ca rathaśārdūlaṃ kṛpaṃ ca sumahāratham
GE07mbh_04_u:042.002a: ukto 'yam artha ācāryo mayā karṇena cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_04_u:042.002c: punar eva ca vakṣyāmi na hi tṛpyāmi taṃ bruvan
GE07mbh_04_u:042.003a: parājitair hi vastavyaṃ taiś ca dvādaśa vatsarān
GE07mbh_04_u:042.003c: vane janapade 'jñātair eṣa eva paṇo hi naḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.004a: teṣāṃ na tāvan nirvṛttaṃ vartate tu trayodaśam
GE07mbh_04_u:042.005a: anivṛtte tu nirvāse yadi bībhatsur āgataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.005c: punar dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane vatsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.006a: lobhād vā te na jānīyur asmān vā moha āviśat
GE07mbh_04_u:042.007a: arthānāṃ tu punar dvaidhe nityaṃ bhavati saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.007b-0803_001: svārthe sarve vimuhyanti ye 'pi dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.007c: anyathā cintito hy arthaḥ punar bhavati cānyathā
GE07mbh_04_u:042.008c: yadi bībhatsur āyātas teṣāṃ kaḥ syāt parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.009a: trigartānāṃ vayaṃ hetor matsyān yoddhum ihāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.009c: matsyānāṃ viprakārāṃs te bahūn asmān akīrtayan
GE07mbh_04_u:042.010c: prathamaṃ tair grahītavyaṃ matsyānāṃ godhanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_04_u:042.011a: saptamīm aparāhṇe vai tathā nas taiḥ samāhitam
GE07mbh_04_u:042.011d-0805_001: imā gāvo gṛhītavyā gate matsye gavāṃ padam
GE07mbh_04_u:042.012a: te vā gāvo na paśyanti yadi va syuḥ parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.012c: asmān vāpy atisaṃdhāya kuryur matsyena saṃgatam
GE07mbh_04_u:042.013a: atha vā tān upāyāto matsyo jānapadaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_04_u:042.013c: sarvayā senayā sārdham asmān yoddhum upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.014a: teṣām eva mahāvīryaḥ kaś cid eva puraḥsaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.014c: asmāñ jetum ihāyāto matsyo vāpi svayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_04_u:042.015a: yady eṣa rājā matsyānāṃ yadi bībhatsur āgataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.015c: sarvair yoddhavyam asmābhir iti naḥ samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.016a: atha kasmāt sthitā hy ete ratheṣu rathasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.016c: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaś caiva vikarṇo drauṇir eva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:042.017a: saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve kāle hy asmin mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.017d-0809_001: sarvalokena vā yuddhaṃ devair vāstu savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.018c: yamena vāpi saṃgrāme ko hāstinapuraṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_04_u:042.019c: ko hi jīvet padātīnāṃ bhaved aśveṣu saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.019e: ācāryaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā tathā nītir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:042.019f-0810_001: duryodhanavacaḥ śrutvā rāṃdheyas tv abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.020a: jānāti hi mataṃ teṣām atas trāsayatīva naḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.021a: tathā hi dṛṣṭvā bībhatsum upāyāntaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_04_u:042.021c: yathā senā na bhajyeta tathā nītir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:042.021d-0811_001: heṣitaṃ hy upaśṛṇvāne droṇe sarvaṃ vighaṭṭitam
GE07mbh_04_u:042.022c: yathā na vibhramet senā tathā nītir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:042.022d-0812_001: iṣṭā hi pāṇḍavā nityam ācāryasya viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.022d-0813_001: āsayann aparārthāś ca kathyate sma svayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:042.023a: aśvānāṃ heṣitaṃ śrutvā kā praśaṃsā bhavet pare
GE07mbh_04_u:042.023c: sthāne vāpi vrajanto vā sadā heṣanti vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.024a: sadā ca vāyavo vānti nityaṃ varṣati vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.024c: stanayitnoś ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate bahuśas tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:042.024d-0814_001: bhīṣayan pāṇḍaveyebhyo bhavān sarvān imāñ janān
GE07mbh_04_u:042.024d-0814_004: heṣitāny eva śṛṇvanti syād idaṃ bhavatas tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:042.025a: kim atra kāryaṃ pārthasya kathaṃ vā sa praśasyate
GE07mbh_04_u:042.025c: anyatra kāmād dveṣād vā roṣād vāsmāsu kevalāt
GE07mbh_04_u:042.026c: naite mahābhaye prāpte saṃpraṣṭavyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:042.027c: kathā vicitrāḥ kurvāṇāḥ paṇḍitās tatra śobhanāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.030c: vidhīyatāṃ tathā nītir yathā vadhyeta vai paraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:042.031a: gāvaś caiva pratiṣṭhantāṃ senāṃ vyūhantu māciram
GE07mbh_04_u:042.031c: ārakṣāś ca vidhīyantāṃ yatra yotsyāmahe parān
GE07mbh_04_u:042.031d-0816_001: yathāsmākaṃ jayo vīra cintanīyas tathā tvayā
GE07mbh_04_u:043.001a: sarvān āyuṣmato bhītān saṃtrastān iva lakṣaye
GE07mbh_04_u:043.001d-0817_001: yady eṣa jāmadagnyo vā yadi vendraḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:043.002a: yady eṣa rājā matsyānāṃ yadi bībhatsur āgataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:043.003c: nāvṛttir gacchatām asti sarpāṇām iva sarpatām
GE07mbh_04_u:043.004c: chādayantu śarāḥ pārthaṃ śalabhā iva pādapam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.005c: śrūyatāṃ talayoḥ śabdo bheryor āhatayor iva
GE07mbh_04_u:043.005d-0818_001: ekaikaṃ caturaḥ pañca kva cit ṣaṣṭiṃ kva cic chatam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.005d-0818_002: mayā paśyata matsyānām iṣubhir nihatān rathān
GE07mbh_04_u:043.005d-0818_003: ekaṃ dvau caturaḥ pañca kva cit ṣaṣṭiṃ kva cic chatam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.005d-0818_004: hatān paśyata mātaṅgān kīrṇān ekeṣuṇā mayā
GE07mbh_04_u:043.006a: samāhito hi bībhatsur varṣāṇy aṣṭau ca pañca ca
GE07mbh_04_u:043.007a: pātrībhūtaś ca kaunteyo brāhmaṇo guṇavān iva
GE07mbh_04_u:043.008a: eṣa caiva maheṣvāsas triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:043.008c: ahaṃ cāpi kuruśreṣṭhā arjunān nāvaraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_04_u:043.009a: itaś cetaś ca nirmuktaiḥ kāñcanair gārdhravājitaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:043.009c: dṛśyatām adya vai vyoma khadyotair iva saṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.009d-0821_001: tumulaḥ śrūyatāṃ nādaḥ ṣaṭpadāṃ gāyatām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:043.009d-0822_002: kaḥ sahetāgrataḥ sthātum api sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:043.010a: adyāham ṛṇam akṣayyaṃ purā vācā pratiśrutam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.012c: ardayiṣyāmy ahaṃ pārtham ulkābhir iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_04_u:043.012d-0823_002: vivaśaṃ pārtham ādāsye garutmān iva pannagam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.014d-0825_001: kṣudrakair vividhair bhallair nipatadbhiś ca māmakaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:043.015d-0827_002: patatāṃ patatāṃ ghoṣaḥ patatāṃ patatām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:043.016a: jāmadagnyān mayā hy astraṃ yat prāptam ṛṣisattamāt
GE07mbh_04_u:043.016c: tad upāśritya vīryaṃ ca yudhyeyam api vāsavam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.017a: dhvajāgre vānaras tiṣṭhan bhallena nihato mayā
GE07mbh_04_u:043.017c: adyaiva patatāṃ bhūmau vinadan bhairavān ravān
GE07mbh_04_u:043.018c: diśaḥ pratiṣṭhamānānām astu śabdo divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:043.018d-0828_001: kruddhenāstraṃ mayā muktaṃ nirdahet pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_04_u:043.020c: niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgam adya paśyantu kauravāḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:043.021c: ratheṣu vāpi tiṣṭhanto yuddhaṃ paśyantu māmakam
GE07mbh_04_u:043.021d-0829_001: paśyantu vīryam iha māmakam adya nāma
GE07mbh_04_u:043.021d-0829_004: evaṃ punaḥ sa virarāma kṛpo babhāṣe
GE07mbh_04_u:044.001a: sadaiva tava rādheya yuddhe krūratarā matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.002a: nayā hi bahavaḥ santi śāstrāṇy āśritya cintitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.002c: teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ tu pāpiṣṭhaṃ vedayanti purāvidaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.003c: hīnakālaṃ tad eveha phalavan na bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_04_u:044.003e: deśe kāle ca vikrāntaṃ kalyāṇāya vidhīyate
GE07mbh_04_u:044.004c: bhāraṃ hi rathakārasya na vyavasyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.005a: paricintya tu pārthena saṃnipāto na naḥ kṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.005b-0831_001: eko hi samare śatrūn samarthaḥ pratibādhitum
GE07mbh_04_u:044.005c: ekaḥ kurūn abhyarakṣad ekaś cāgnim atarpayat
GE07mbh_04_u:044.006a: ekaś ca pañca varṣāṇi brahmacaryam adhārayat
GE07mbh_04_u:044.006c: ekaḥ subhadrām āropya dvairathe kṛṣṇam āhvayat
GE07mbh_04_u:044.006e: asminn eva vane kṛṣṇo hṛtāṃ kṛṣṇām avājayat
GE07mbh_04_u:044.007a: ekaś ca pañca varṣāṇi śakrād astrāṇy aśikṣata
GE07mbh_04_u:044.007c: ekaḥ sāṃyaminīṃ jitvā kurūṇām akarod yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.008c: vijigye tarasā saṃkhye senāṃ cāsya sudurjayām
GE07mbh_04_u:044.008d-0834_001: pāñcālīṃ śrīmatīṃ prāptaḥ kṣatraṃ jitvā svayaṃvare
GE07mbh_04_u:044.008d-0834_002: ādāya gatavān pārtho bhavān kva nu gatas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:044.009c: daivatair apy avadhyās te ekena yudhi pātitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.010a: ekena hi tvayā karṇa kiṃ nāmeha kṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_04_u:044.011a: indro 'pi hi na pārthena saṃyuge yoddhum arhati
GE07mbh_04_u:044.011c: yas tenāśaṃsate yoddhuṃ kartavyaṃ tasya bheṣajam
GE07mbh_04_u:044.013a: atha vā kuñjaraṃ mattam eka eva caran vane
GE07mbh_04_u:044.015a: ātmānaṃ yaḥ samudbadhya kaṇṭhe baddhvā mahāśilām
GE07mbh_04_u:044.015c: samudraṃ pratared dorbhyāṃ tatra kiṃ nāma pauruṣam
GE07mbh_04_u:044.016c: tādṛśaṃ karṇa yaḥ pārthaṃ yoddhum icchet sa durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.017c: siṃhaḥ pāśavinirmukto na naḥ śeṣaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:044.018a: ekānte pārtham āsīnaṃ kūpe 'gnim iva saṃvṛtam

GE07mbh_04_u:044.018d-0836_001: utsṛṣṭaṃ tūlarāśau tu eko 'gniṃ śamayet katham
GE07mbh_04_u:044.020a: droṇo duryodhano bhīṣmo bhavān drauṇis tathā vayam

GE07mbh_04_u:044.022d-041_0001: kṛpasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā karṇo rājan yudhāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:044.022d-041_0002: punaḥ provāca saṃkruddho garhayan brāhmaṇaṃ kṛpam
GE07mbh_04_u:044.022d-041_0003: lakṣayāmy aham ācāryaṃ bhayād bhaktiṃ gataṃ ripau
GE07mbh_04_u:044.022d-041_0004: bhītena hi na yoddhavyam ahaṃ yotsye dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_04_u:044.022d-041_0005: nanu vāruṇam āgneyaṃ yāmyaṃ vāyavyam eva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:044.022d-041_0006: astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva sattvahīnaś ca te vṛthā

GE07mbh_04_u:048.004d-0875_001: eṣa udāra āyāti rathe ca rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.005b-0876_002: hrīmān vadānyo dhṛtimān satkaroti ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.006a: imau hi bāṇau sahitau pādayor me vyavasthitau
GE07mbh_04_u:048.006c: aparau cāpy atikrāntau karṇau saṃspṛśya me śarau
GE07mbh_04_u:048.007a: niruṣya hi vane vāsaṃ kṛtvā karmātimānuṣam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.007d-0880_001: kuśalaṃ paripṛṣṭvā ca gatās te kaṅkavāsasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.007d-0881_002: adyemāṃ bhāratīṃ senām eko nāśayate dhruvam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.007d-0882_003: khaḍgī ca dhanvī ca vibhāti pārthaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.007d-0883_001: tam adūram upāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavam arjunam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.007d-0883_002: nārayaḥ prekṣituṃ śekus tapasyantaṃ yathā ravim
GE07mbh_04_u:048.007d-0883_003: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rathānīkaṃ pārthaḥ sārathim abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:048.008a: iṣupāte ca senāyā hayān saṃyaccha sārathe
GE07mbh_04_u:048.008d-0884_002: parijānāmy ahaṃ tasya dhvajaṃ dūrāt samucchritam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.008d-0884_003: yady enam iha paśyāmi durbuddhim atimāninam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.009a: sarvān anyān anādṛtya dṛṣṭvā tam atimāninam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.009c: tasya mūrdhni patiṣyāmi tata ete parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.010a: eṣa vyavasthito droṇo drauṇiś ca tadanantaram
GE07mbh_04_u:048.010c: bhīṣmaḥ kṛpaś ca karṇaś ca maheṣvāsā vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.011a: rājānaṃ nātra paśyāmi gāḥ samādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012c: tatraiva yotsye vairāṭe nāsti yuddhaṃ nirāmiṣam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012e: taṃ jitvā vinivartiṣye gāḥ samādāya vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_003: (9d) tasmin hate bhaviṣyanti sarva eva parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_005: asabhyānāṃ ca vaktāraṃ kurūṇāṃ kila kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_006: (11a,12d) rājānaṃ neha paśyāmi nirāmiṣam idaṃ balam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_007: abhidrave ha rājānaṃ vyaktam ity atra nirbhayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_008: (10ab) āsthito madhyamācāryo hy aśvatthāmā tv anantaram
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_013: daśārṇaś caiva kāliṅgo vāmaṃ pakṣaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_014: pṛṣṭhataḥ kurumukhyas tu bhīṣmas tiṣṭhati daṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_016: (11ab) duryodhanaṃ na paśyāmi kva nu rājā sa gacchati
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_018: (12ef) taṃ hatvā vinivartiṣye gāḥ sa ādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0885_019: gavāgram abhito yāhi yatra rājā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0886_001: ity uktvā samare pārtho vairāṭim aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0886_006: eṣa duryodhanaṃ pārtho mārgate vikṛtiṃ smaran
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0886_007: senām atyartham ālokya tvarate grahaṇe kṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.012f-0887_001: paścād ete pradātavyā iti me vartate matiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.013a: evam uktaḥ sa vairāṭir hayān saṃyamya yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.013c: niyamya ca tato raśmīn yatra te kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.013e: acodayat tato vāhān yato duryodhanas tataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.016a: na hy enam abhisaṃkruddham eko yudhyeta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_04_u:048.016c: anyo devāt sahasrākṣāt kṛṣṇād vā devakīsutāt
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017a: kiṃ no gāvaḥ kariṣyanti dhanaṃ vā vipulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017c: duryodhanaḥ pārthajale purā naur iva majjati
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_001: ity uktvā samare bhīṣmaḥ senayā saha kauravaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_003: trikośamātraṃ gatvā tu pārtho vairāṭim abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_005: etad agraṃ gavāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mandaṃ vāhaya sārathe
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_006: yāhy uttareṇa senāyā gāś caiva pravibhajya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_007: parikṣipya gavāṃ yūtham atra yotsye suyodhanam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_009: tatra gatvā paśūn vīra sagopān parimocaya
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_010: antareṇa ca senāyāḥ prāṅmukho gaccha cottara
GE07mbh_04_u:048.017d-0889_011: ime tv atirathāḥ sarve mama vīryaparākramam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.018a: tathaiva gatvā bībhatsur nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.018c: śalabhair iva tāṃ senāṃ śaraiḥ śīghram avākirat
GE07mbh_04_u:048.019a: kīryamāṇāḥ śaraughais tu yodhās te pārthacoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.019c: nāpaśyan nāvṛtāṃ bhūmim antarikṣaṃ ca patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.019d-0893_001: gāś caiva hi na paśyanti pārthamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.019d-0893_002: arjunas tu tadā hṛṣṭo darśayan vīryam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.020c: śīghratvam eva pārthasya pūjayanti sma cetasā
GE07mbh_04_u:048.021a: tataḥ śaṅkhaṃ pradadhmau sa dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_04_u:048.021c: visphārya ca dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ dhvaje bhūtāny acodayat
GE07mbh_04_u:048.022d-0896_001: śabdena mahatā rājan saṃtrastaṃ godhanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0001: tataḥ sa samare vīro bībhatsuḥ śatrupūgahā
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0002: gopālāṃś codayām āsa gāś caitāś codayeti ca
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0004: gavām agraṃ samīkṣasva gāś caivāśu nivartaya
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0005: yāvad ete nivartante kuravo javam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0006: yāhy uttareṇa gāś caitāḥ sainyānāṃ ca nṛpātmaja
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0008: te lābham iva manvānāḥ kuravo 'rjunam āhave
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0009: dṛṣṭvā yāntam adūrasthaṃ kṣipram abhyapatan rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0014: tāni dṛṣṭvā hy anīkāni nivartitarathāni ca
GE07mbh_04_u:048.023d-043_0015: pārtho 'pi vāyuvad ghoraṃ sainyāgraṃ vyadhunoc charaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.001a: sa śatrusenāṃ tarasā praṇudya; gās tā vijityātha dhanurdharāgryaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.001c: duryodhanāyābhimukhaṃ prayāto; bhūyo 'rjunaḥ priyam ājau cikīrṣan
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002a: goṣu prayātāsu javena matsyān; kirīṭinaṃ kṛtakāryaṃ ca matvā
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002b-0898_002: gopāgaṇāḥ svān prayayuś ca rāṣṭrān vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002b-0899_001: tatas trīṇi sahasrāṇi rathānāṃ ca dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002b-0899_009: tāni dṛṣṭvā hy anīkāni vitatāni mahātmanām
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002b-0899_010: vairāṭim uttaraṃ taṃ tu pratyabhāṣata pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002c: duryodhanāyābhimukhaṃ prayāntaṃ; kurupravīrāḥ sahasābhipetuḥ uttara uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_002: gāvas tvayā jitāś cemāḥ kiṃ yuddheneti vai vṛthā
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_003: saṃdigdhe 'rthe na yudhyeta puṣṭe vāpi bale sati
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_004: tvayaikena bahūnāṃ hi vigraheṇa tu kiṃ vṛthā
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_005: śrutvaitad arjuno vākyaṃ vairāṭer bhītavat tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_006: prahasya prāha taṃ bhūyo mā bhaiḥ paśyeha kautukam
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_007: bahūni dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi prāg yuddhāny uttara tvayā
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_008: paśyemam evaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ bahūnām ekakena yat
GE07mbh_04_u:049.002d-0902_009: tato duryodhanaṃ yāntam arjunaṃ tarasā tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:049.003a: teṣām anīkāni bahūni gāḍhaṃ; vyūḍhāni dṛṣṭvā bahuladhvajāni
GE07mbh_04_u:049.003c: matsyasya putraṃ dviṣatāṃ nihantā; vairāṭim āmantrya tato 'bhyuvāca arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.004a: etena tūrṇaṃ pratipādayemāñ; śvetān hayān kāñcanaraśmiyoktrān
GE07mbh_04_u:049.004c: javena sarveṇa kuru prayatnam; āsādayaitad rathasiṃhavṛndam
GE07mbh_04_u:049.005a: gajo gajeneva mayā durātmā; yo yoddhum ākāṅkṣati sūtaputraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.005c: tam eva māṃ prāpaya rājaputra; duryodhanāpāśrayajātadarpam
GE07mbh_04_u:049.006a: sa tair hayair vātajavair bṛhadbhiḥ; putro virāṭasya suvarṇakakṣyaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.006c: vidhvaṃsayaṃs tadrathinām anīkaṃ; tato 'vahat pāṇḍavam ājimadhye
GE07mbh_04_u:049.006d-0908_009: śoṇo niṣedhaś ca tam anvayus te
GE07mbh_04_u:049.007a: taṃ citraseno viśikhair vipāṭhaiḥ; saṃgrāmajic chatrusaho jayaś ca
GE07mbh_04_u:049.007c: pratyudyayur bhāratam āpatantaṃ; mahārathāḥ karṇam abhīpsamānāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.008a: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ puruṣapravīraḥ; śarāsanārciḥ śaravegatāpaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.008c: vrātān rathānām adahat sa manyur; vanaṃ yathāgniḥ kurupuṃgavānām
GE07mbh_04_u:049.009a: tasmiṃs tu yuddhe tumule pravṛtte; pārthaṃ vikarṇo 'tirathaṃ rathena
GE07mbh_04_u:049.010a: tato vikarṇasya dhanur vikṛṣya; jāmbūnadāgryopacitaṃ dṛḍhajyam
GE07mbh_04_u:049.010c: apātayad dhvajam asya pramathya; chinnadhvajaḥ so 'py apayāj javena
GE07mbh_04_u:049.011a: taṃ śātravāṇāṃ gaṇabādhitāraṃ; karmāṇi kurvāṇam amānuṣāṇi
GE07mbh_04_u:049.011c: śatruṃtapaḥ kopam amṛṣyamāṇaḥ; samarpayat kūrmanakhena pārtham
GE07mbh_04_u:049.012a: sa tena rājñātirathena viddho; vigāhamāno dhvajinīṃ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_04_u:049.012c: śatruṃtapaṃ pañcabhir āśu viddhvā; tato 'sya sūtaṃ daśabhir jaghāna
GE07mbh_04_u:049.013a: tataḥ sa viddho bharatarṣabheṇa; bāṇena gātrāvaraṇātigena
GE07mbh_04_u:049.013c: gatāsur ājau nipapāta bhūmau; nago nagāgrād iva vātarugṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.014a: ratharṣabhās te tu ratharṣabheṇa; vīrā raṇe vīratareṇa bhagnāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.015a: hatās tu pārthena narapravīrā; bhūmau yuvānaḥ suṣupuḥ suveṣāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.016a: tathā sa śatrūn samare vinighnan; gāṇḍīvadhanvā puruṣapravīraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.016c: cacāra saṃkhye pradiśo diśaś ca; dahann ivāgnir vanam ātapānte
GE07mbh_04_u:049.017a: prakīrṇaparṇāni yathā vasante; viśātayitvātyanilo nudan khe
GE07mbh_04_u:049.017c: tathā sapatnān vikiran kirīṭī; cacāra saṃkhye 'tiratho rathena
GE07mbh_04_u:049.018c: ekena saṃgrāmajitaḥ śareṇa; śiro jahārātha kirīṭamālī
GE07mbh_04_u:049.019a: tasmin hate bhrātari sūtaputro; vaikartano vīryam athādadānaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.019c: pragṛhya dantāv iva nāgarājo; maharṣabhaṃ vyāghra ivābhyadhāvat
GE07mbh_04_u:049.020a: sa pāṇḍavaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; vaikartanaḥ śīghram upājaghāna
GE07mbh_04_u:049.020c: vivyādha gātreṣu hayāṃś ca sarvān; virāṭaputraṃ ca śarair nijaghne
GE07mbh_04_u:049.021a: sa hastinevābhihato gajendraḥ; pragṛhya bhallān niśitān niṣaṅgāt
GE07mbh_04_u:049.021c: ākarṇapūrṇaṃ ca dhanur vikṛṣya; vivyādha bāṇair atha sūtaputram
GE07mbh_04_u:049.022c: sthitasya bāṇair yudhi nirbibheda; gāṇḍīvamuktair aśaniprakāśaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:049.023a: sa pārthamuktair viśikhaiḥ praṇunno; gajo gajeneva jitas tarasvī
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0005: na rathānāṃ na cāśvānāṃ na dhvajānāṃ na varmaṇām
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0006: atividdhaiḥ śitair bāṇair āsīd dvyaṅgulam antaram
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0007: daivayogād dhi pārthasya hayānām uttarasya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0010: itas tataś ca saṃyāne dūre vāpy atha vāntike
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0011: durge viṣamajāte vā sthale nimne tathā kṣitau
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0012: na ca rudhyed gatis tasya rathasya manaso yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0013: samareṣu tu vidvāṃsas tasya tāṃs tān parākramān
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0014: vīryam atyadbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā pārthasya tad balam
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0015: tresur eva pare bhītāḥ parāṅmukharathā api
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0016: kālāgnim iva bībhatsuṃ nirdahantam iva prajāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0017: nārayaḥ prekṣituṃ śekur jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0023: chatrāṇi ca patākāś ca khe 'bhyuvāha sadāgatiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0024: ye hy arjunabalatrastāḥ paripetur diśo daśa
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0027: śirobhiḥ prathamaṃ jagmur medinīṃ jaghanair hayāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0029: marmasv anyeṣu cāhatya tathā nighnan gajottamān
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0031: kṣaṇena saṃvṛtā bhūmir meghair iva nabhastalam
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0032: astrair divyair mahābāhur arjunaḥ pradahann iva
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0037: daivād vīryāc ca bībhatsus tasmin dauryodhane bale
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0039: ceṣṭāṃ prāyeṇa bhūtānāṃ rātriḥ prāṇabhṛtām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0047: kirīṭaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ vaiyāghram atha carma ca
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0048: tasya sarvāṇi gātrāṇi rathasya dviṣatāṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0050: sakṛd eva na taṃ śekū ratham abhyasituṃ pare
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0051: anabhyastaḥ punas tair hi rathaḥ so 'tipapāta tān
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0053: dviḍanīkeṣu bībhatsor na sasañja rathas tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0054: sa tad vikṣobhayām āsa vigāhyāribalaṃ rathī
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0057: satataṃ śrūyate bhūtair dhanuṣaś ca kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0059: saṃsyūtās tatra dṛśyante meghā iva gabhastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0062: patanty arūpeṣu yathā cakṣūṃṣi na kadā cana
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0067: hanty asmān iti manyante pārthenaivārditāḥ pare
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0068: ghnantam atyartham ahitān savyasāciṃ tu menire
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0069: kālam arjunarūpeṇa grasantam iva ca prajāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0073: avanemuḥ kurūṇāṃ hi vīryād arjunajād bhayāt
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0075: cakāra cārjunaḥ krodhād vimukhān ruṣitān api
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0076: arjunena vibhinnāni balāgrāṇi punaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0081: lohiteṣu nimagnās te nihatāś ca kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0083: sārkaṃ tat tatkṣaṇenāsīt saṃdhyābhram iva lohitam
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0084: apyastaṃ prāpya cādityo nivarteta na pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0085: nivarteta na jitvārīn ity ajalpan vicakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0086: tān sarvān samare śūrān pauruṣe paryavasthitān
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0087: divyair astrair ameyātmā sarvān ārcchad dhanurdharān
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0088: sa tu droṇaṃ trisaptatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samarpayat
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0089: aśītyā śakuniṃ caiva drauṇim apy āśu saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0093: sa karṇaṃ karṇināvidhyat pītena niśitena ca
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0094: vāsavir dviṣatāṃ madhye vivyādha parameṣu ca
GE07mbh_04_u:050.002b-045_0095: sa karṇaṃ satanutrāṇaṃ nirbhidya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0009: astrāṇāṃ tava divyānāṃ śaraughān kṣipataś ca te

GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0013: tava bāhubalaṃ caiva dhanuḥ prākarṣato bahu vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0014: tava tejo durādharṣaṃ yathā viṣṇos trivikrame
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0027: uttaraṃ caiva bībhatsur abravīt punar arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0028: na bhetavyaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ tāta saṃgrāmamūrdhani
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0029: rājaputro 'si bhadraṃ te kule mahati mātsyake
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0030: jātas tvaṃ kṣatriyakule na viṣīditum arhasi
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0031: dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā suvipulāṃ rājaputra rathaṃ mama
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0033: uktvā tam evaṃ bībhatsur arjunaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:053.001f-048_0034: pāṇḍavo rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhāradvājaṃ samīkṣya tu
GE07mbh_04_u:053.004a: buddhyā tulyo hy uśanasā bṛhaspatisamo naye
GE07mbh_04_u:053.004c: vedās tathaiva catvāro brahmacaryaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_04_u:053.005c: dhanurvedaś ca kārtsnyena yasmin nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.005d-0940_001: purāṇam itihāsaṃ ca arthavidyā ca mānavī
GE07mbh_04_u:053.006a: kṣamā damaś ca satyaṃ ca ānṛśaṃsyam athārjavam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.006c: ete cānye ca bahavo guṇā yasmin dvijottame
GE07mbh_04_u:053.006d-0941_001: yasyāham iṣṭaḥ satataṃ mama ceṣṭaḥ sadā ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.007c: tasmāt tvaṃ prāpayācāryaṃ kṣipram uttara vāhaya
GE07mbh_04_u:053.007d-0942_001: aparaṃ paśya saṃgrāmam adbhutaṃ mama tasya ca
GE07mbh_04_u:053.008c: codayām āsa tān aśvān bhāradvājarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_04_u:053.009a: tam āpatantaṃ vegena pāṇḍavaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.009c: droṇaḥ pratyudyayau pārthaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.009d-0943_001: sa tu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaunteyaṃ samabhidrutam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.009d-0943_002: ācāryaṃ taṃ mahābāhuḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:053.010c: pracukṣubhe balaṃ sarvam uddhūta iva sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.011a: atha śoṇān sadaśvāṃs tān haṃsavarṇair manojavaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.011c: miśritān samare dṛṣṭvā vyasmayanta raṇe janāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.013c: dṛṣṭvā prākampata muhur bharatānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.014a: harṣayuktas tathā pārthaḥ prahasann iva vīryavān
GE07mbh_04_u:053.016a: uṣitāḥ sma vane vāsaṃ pratikarma cikīrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.016c: kopaṃ nārhasi naḥ kartuṃ sadā samaradurjaya
GE07mbh_04_u:053.017a: ahaṃ tu prahṛte pūrvaṃ prahariṣyāmi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_04_u:053.017c: iti me vartate buddhis tad bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_04_u:053.018c: aprāptāṃś caiva tān pārthaś ciccheda kṛtahastavat
GE07mbh_04_u:053.019c: avākirat tato droṇaḥ śīghram astraṃ vidarśayan
GE07mbh_04_u:053.021a: tāv ubhau khyātakarmāṇāv ubhau vāyusamau jave
GE07mbh_04_u:053.021f-0945_001: arjunaṃ vā vinā droṇāt ko 'nyo yoddhuṃ raṇe 'rhati
GE07mbh_04_u:053.022a: vyasmayanta tato yodhāḥ sarve tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.022c: śarān visṛjatos tūrṇaṃ sādhu sādhv iti pūjayan
GE07mbh_04_u:053.023a: droṇaṃ hi samare ko 'nyo yoddhum arhati phalgunāt
GE07mbh_04_u:053.023e: ity abruvañ janās tatra saṃgrāmaśirasi sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.024a: vīrau tāv api saṃrabdhau saṃnikṛṣṭau mahārathau
GE07mbh_04_u:053.026a: sa sāyakamayair jālair arjunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_04_u:053.027a: pārthaṃ ca sa mahābāhur mahāvegair mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.027c: vivyādha niśitair bāṇair megho vṛṣṭyeva parvatam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.028a: tathaiva divyaṃ gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur ādāya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.028d-0948_001: śobhate sma mahābāhur gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.030a: sa rathena caran pārthaḥ prekṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.030d-0949_001: ādadānaṃ śarān ghorān saṃdadhānaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.030d-0949_002: visṛjantaṃ ca kaunteyaṃ na sma paśyanti lāghavāt
GE07mbh_04_u:053.033a: dṛṣṭvā tu pārthasya raṇe śaraiḥ svaratham āvṛtam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.033d-0951_001: asakṛn muñcato bāṇān dadṛśuḥ kuravo yudhi
GE07mbh_04_u:053.033d-0951_002: dikṣu sarvāsu vipulaḥ śuśruve caratas tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:053.034c: vyaśātayac charāṃs tāṃs tu droṇaḥ samitiśobhanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.034d-0952_001: babhāse timiraṃ vyomni vidhūya savitā yathā
GE07mbh_04_u:053.034e: mahān abhūt tataḥ śabdo vaṃśānām iva dahyatām
GE07mbh_04_u:053.035c: prācchādayad ameyātmā diśaḥ sūryasya ca prabhām
GE07mbh_04_u:053.037c: eko dīrgha ivādṛśyad ākāśe saṃhataḥ śaraḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.038c: ākāśaṃ saṃvṛtaṃ vīrāv ulkābhir iva cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.039c: paṅktyaḥ śaradi khasthānāṃ haṃsānāṃ caratām iva
GE07mbh_04_u:053.041a: tau gajāv iva cāsādya viṣāṇāgraiḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.042d-0954_001: pārthas tu samare śūro darśayan vīryam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.042d-0954_002: sa mahāstrair mahātmānaṃ droṇaṃ prācchādayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.043a: atha tv ācāryamukhyena śarān sṛṣṭāñ śilāśitān
GE07mbh_04_u:053.043c: nyavārayac chitair bāṇair arjuno jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.044c: iṣubhis tūrṇam ākāśaṃ bahubhiś ca samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_04_u:053.048a: aindraṃ vāyavyam āgneyam astram astreṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.048c: droṇena muktaṃ muktaṃ tu grasate sma punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.049a: evaṃ śūrau maheṣvāsau visṛjantau śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_04_u:053.050c: parvateṣv iva vajrāṇāṃ śarāṇāṃ śrūyate svanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.051a: tato nāgā rathāś caiva sādinaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_04_u:053.051d-0957_002: rejuḥ pārthaśarais tatra tadā sainyāni bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:053.052a: bāhubhiś ca sakeyūrair vicitraiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.054a: vidhunvānau tu tau vīrau dhanuṣī bhārasādhane
GE07mbh_04_u:053.055c: duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān droṇo yad arjunam ayodhayat
GE07mbh_04_u:053.057a: aviśramaṃ ca śikṣāṃ ca lāghavaṃ dūrapātitām
GE07mbh_04_u:053.057c: pārthasya samare dṛṣṭvā droṇasyābhūc ca vismayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.057d-0959_001: tatpravṛttaṃ ciraṃ ghoraṃ tayor yuddhaṃ mahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.058a: atha gāṇḍīvam udyamya divyaṃ dhanur amarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.059b-0960_001: dṛṣṭvā te vismitāḥ sarve sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan
GE07mbh_04_u:053.059c: na ca bāṇāntare vāyur asya śaknoti sarpitum
GE07mbh_04_u:053.060c: dadṛśe nāntaraṃ kiṃ cit pārthasyādadato 'pi ca
GE07mbh_04_u:053.061c: śīghrāc chīghrataraṃ pārthaḥ śarān anyān udīrayat
GE07mbh_04_u:053.062c: yugapat prāpataṃs tatra droṇasya ratham antikāt
GE07mbh_04_u:053.064c: gandharvāpsarasaś caiva ye ca tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.064d-0961_001: droṇaṃ yuddhārṇave magnaṃ dṛṣṭvā putraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_04_u:053.066a: aśvatthāmā tu tat karma hṛdayena mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.066c: pūjayām āsa pārthasya kopaṃ cāsyākarod bhṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:053.067a: sa manyuvaśam āpannaḥ pārtham abhyadravad raṇe
GE07mbh_04_u:053.068a: āvṛtya tu mahābāhur yato drauṇis tato hayān
GE07mbh_04_u:053.069a: sa tu labdhvāntaraṃ tūrṇam apāyāj javanair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:053.069d-0962_002: sadaṇḍa iva raktākṣaḥ kṛtāntaḥ samare sthitaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:054.003a: na sma sūryas tadā bhāti na ca vāti samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:054.005c: sa rājan na prajānāti diśaṃ kāṃ cana mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:054.006c: vivaraṃ sūkṣmam ālokya jyāṃ ciccheda kṣureṇa ha
GE07mbh_04_u:054.006f-0964_001: na śakto 'nyaḥ pumān sthātum ṛte pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_04_u:054.006f-0965_001: droṇo bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś caiva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:054.006f-0966_001: sādhu sādhv iti bhāṣanto pūjayan karma tasya tat
GE07mbh_04_u:054.007a: tato drauṇir dhanūṃṣy aṣṭau vyapakramya nararṣabham
GE07mbh_04_u:054.008a: tataḥ pārtho mahābāhuḥ prahasya svanavat tadā
GE07mbh_04_u:054.008c: yojayām āsa navayā maurvyā gāṇḍīvam ojasā
GE07mbh_04_u:054.008d-0967_001: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham āyāntaṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_04_u:054.008d-0967_002: kruddhaḥ samāhvayām āsa drauṇir yuddhāya bhārata
GE07mbh_04_u:054.009b-0968_001: ciccheda tasya cāpaṃ ca sūtaṃ cāśvān rathasya vai
GE07mbh_04_u:054.011a: tau vīrau kuravaḥ sarve dadṛśur vismayānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:054.013c: tena pārtho raṇe śūras tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:054.014a: aśvatthāmnaḥ punar bāṇāḥ kṣipram abhyasyato raṇe
GE07mbh_04_u:054.015a: tataḥ karṇo mahac cāpaṃ vikṛṣyābhyadhikaṃ ruṣā
GE07mbh_04_u:054.015c: avākṣipat tataḥ śabdo hāhākāro mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_04_u:054.016a: tatra cakṣur dadhe pārtho yatra visphāryate dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:054.017a: sa roṣavaśam āpannaḥ karṇam eva jighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_04_u:054.018a: tathā tu vimukhe pārthe droṇaputrasya sāyakān
GE07mbh_04_u:054.020c: kāmayan dvairathe yuddham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:055.001a: karṇa yat te sabhāmadhye bahu vācā vikatthitam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.001c: na me yudhi samo 'stīti tad idaṃ pratyupasthitam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.001d-0969_001: so 'dya karṇa mayā sārdhaṃ vyavahṛtya mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_04_u:055.001d-0969_002: jñāsyasy avaram ātmānaṃ na cānyān avamanyase
GE07mbh_04_u:055.002a: avocaḥ paruṣā vāco dharmam utsṛjya kevalam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.002c: idaṃ tu duṣkaraṃ manye yad idaṃ te cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.003a: yat tvayā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ mām anāsādya kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_04_u:055.003c: tad adya kuru rādheya kurumadhye mayā saha
GE07mbh_04_u:055.004a: yat sabhāyāṃ sma pāñcālīṃ kliśyamānāṃ durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.004c: dṛṣṭavān asi tasyādya phalam āpnuhi kevalam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.005c: tasya rādheya kopasya vijayaṃ paśya me mṛdhe
GE07mbh_04_u:055.005d-0970_001: vane dvādaśa varṣāṇi yāni soḍhāni durmate
GE07mbh_04_u:055.006a: ehi karṇa mayā sārdhaṃ pratipadyasva saṃgaram
GE07mbh_04_u:055.007a: bravīṣi vācā yat pārtha karmaṇā tat samācara
GE07mbh_04_u:055.007c: atiśete hi vai vācaṃ karmeti prathitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_04_u:055.008a: yat tvayā marṣitaṃ pūrvaṃ tad aśaktena marṣitam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.008c: iti gṛhṇāmi tat pārtha tava dṛṣṭvāparākramam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.009c: tathaiva baddham ātmānam abaddham iva manyase
GE07mbh_04_u:055.010a: yadi tāvad vane vāso yathoktaś caritas tvayā
GE07mbh_04_u:055.010c: tat tvaṃ dharmārthavit kliṣṭaḥ samayaṃ bhettum icchasi
GE07mbh_04_u:055.011a: yadi śakraḥ svayaṃ pārtha yudhyate tava kāraṇāt
GE07mbh_04_u:055.011c: tathāpi na vyathā kā cin mama syād vikramiṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.012a: ayaṃ kaunteya kāmas te nacirāt samupasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.012c: yotsyase tvaṃ mayā sārdham adya drakṣyasi me balam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.013a: idānīm eva tāvat tvam apayāto raṇān mama
GE07mbh_04_u:055.013c: tena jīvasi rādheya nihatas tv anujas tava
GE07mbh_04_u:055.013d-0971_001: khadyoto dyotate tāvad yāvan nodayate śaśī
GE07mbh_04_u:055.013d-0971_002: udite ca sahasrāṃśau na khadyoto na candramāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.013d-0971_003: prākṛtān puruṣāñ jitvā vṛthā te karṇa garjitam
GE07mbh_04_u:055.014a: bhrātaraṃ ghātayitvā ca tyaktvā raṇaśiraś ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.014c: tvad anyaḥ puruṣaḥ satsu brūyād evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.015a: iti karṇaṃ bruvann eva bībhatsur aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.016d-0972_001: abhiyāya hi bībhatsur gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.016d-0972_002: jighāṃsuḥ samare karṇaṃ visasarja śarān bahūn
GE07mbh_04_u:055.017b-0973_002: na sma sūryaḥ pratapati na ca vāti samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.017b-0973_004: gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣaḥ karṇasya dhanuṣas tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:055.017b-0973_006: arjunas tu hayān nāgān rathāṃś ca vinipātayan
GE07mbh_04_u:055.017b-0973_007: kṣobhayām āsa tat sainyaṃ karṇaṃ vivyādha cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_04_u:055.017c: avidhyad aśvān bāhvoś ca hastāvāpaṃ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_04_u:055.019c: vivyādha pāṇḍavaṃ haste tasya muṣṭir aśīryata
GE07mbh_04_u:055.020a: tataḥ pārtho mahābāhuḥ karṇasya dhanur acchinat
GE07mbh_04_u:055.020c: sa śaktiṃ prāhiṇot tasmai tāṃ pārtho vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.020d-0974_001: chinnadhanvā tataḥ karṇaḥ śaktiṃ cikṣepa vegavān
GE07mbh_04_u:055.020d-0974_002: tāṃ śaktiṃ samare pārthaś ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.022c: ākarṇamuktair abhyaghnaṃs te hatāḥ prāpatan bhuvi
GE07mbh_04_u:055.024a: tasya bhittvā tanutrāṇaṃ kāyam abhyapatac charaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.024c: tataḥ sa tamasāviṣṭo na sma kiṃ cit prajajñivān
GE07mbh_04_u:055.025a: sa gāḍhavedano hitvā raṇaṃ prāyād udaṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:055.025d-0976_001: dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ tadā rājann apayāntaṃ raṇājirāt
GE07mbh_04_u:056.001a: tato vaikartanaṃ jitvā pārtho vairāṭim abravīt
GE07mbh_04_u:056.001c: etan māṃ prāpayānīkaṃ yatra tālo hiraṇmayaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002e: ādāsyāmy aham etasya dhanurjyām api cāhave
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0002: abravīd uttaraḥ pārthaṃ pratividdhaḥ śarair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0003: nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi vīreha niyantuṃ te hayottamān
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0004: viṣīdanti mama prāṇā mano vihvalatīva me
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0006: tvayā ca kurubhiś caiva bhramantīva diśo daśa
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0008: dvaidhībhūtaṃ mano me 'dya trāsaṃ caiva prapaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0011: siṃhanādaiś ca śūrāṇāṃ gajānāṃ bṛṃhitais tathā
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0013: śrutiḥ smṛtiś ca me vīra pranaṣṭā mūḍhacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0016: dṛṣṭir vicalitā vīra hṛdayaṃ dīryatīva me
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0017: vapuś cograṃ tava raṇe kruddhasyeva pinākinaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0018: vyāyacchatas tava bhujaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīr me bhavaty api
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0019: nādadānaṃ na saṃdhānaṃ na muñcantaṃ śarottamān
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0020: tvām ahaṃ saṃprapaśyāmi paśyann api vicetanaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0021: avasīdanti me prāṇā bhūr iyaṃ calatīva me arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0022: na ca pratodaṃ nābhīṣūn saṃyantuṃ śaktir asti me
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0025: rājaputro 'si bhadraṃ te kule matsyasya viśrute
GE07mbh_04_u:056.002f-049_0026: jātas tvaṃ śatrudamane na viṣīditum arhasi

GE07mbh_04_u:057.001a: atha saṃgamya sarve tu kauravāṇāṃ mahārathāḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:058.005a: śaraughān samyag asyanto jīmūtā iva vārṣikāḥ

GE07mbh_04_u:059.001d-050_0001: evaṃ vidrāvya tat sainyaṃ pārtho bhīṣmam upādravat

GE07mbh_04_u:059.039d-1027_006: jetum icchanti saṃgrāme bhavān yudhyasva phalgunam

GE07mbh_04_u:059.044d-052_0001: gās tā vijitya saṃgrāme kurūṇāṃ miṣatāṃ vane

GE07mbh_04_u:059.044d-052_0018: śaraughān samyag asyanto jīmūtā iva vārṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:059.044d-052_0025: na rathānāṃ na nāgānāṃ na dhvajānāṃ na vājinām
GE07mbh_04_u:059.044d-052_0026: aviddhaṃ niśitair bāṇair āsīd dvyaṅgulam antaram
GE07mbh_04_u:059.044d-052_0033: tato vigāhya sainyānāṃ madhyaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_04_u:059.044d-052_0035: saṃniyamya hayān etān mandaṃ vāhaya sārathe
